description: They live in mountains where no trace of humans can be detected. Jangmo-o grow little by little as they battle one another. It smacks the scales on its head against rocks or against the ground to frighten its opponents. It can also contact its friends with these noises.
name: Jangmo-o

description: It sheds and regrows its scales on a continuous basis. The scales become harder and sharper each time they're regrown. It makes noise by clanging its scales together. When the rhythm has reached its peak, Hakamo-o attacks.
name: Hakamo-o

description: Its rigid scales function as offense and defense. In the past, its scales were processed and used to make weapons and other commodities. When it howls after finishing off its prey, the metallic sounds of its celebrating comrades can be heard from all around.
name: Kommo-o

description: It confuses its enemies by flying too quickly for the eye to follow. It has a hair-trigger temper but forgets what made it angry an instant later. Although it's called a guardian deity, if a person or Pokémon puts it in a bad mood, it will become a malevolent deity and attack.
name: Tapu Koko

description: As it flutters about, it scatters its strangely glowing scales. Touching them is said to restore good health on the spot. It heals the wounds of people and Pokémon by sprinkling them with its sparkling scales. This guardian deity is worshiped on Akala.
name: Tapu Lele

description: The guardian deity of Ula'ula is a lazy Pokémon. It commands plants to immobilize its foes and then deals them a savage blow with its horns. Although it's called a guardian deity, it's violent enough to crush anyone it sees as an enemy.
name: Tapu Bulu

description: The guardian deity of Poni, it can control water. People say it can create pure water that will wash away any uncleanness. This guardian deity of Poni Island manipulates water. Because it lives deep within a thick fog, it came to be both feared and revered.
name: Tapu Fini

description: In ages past, it was called the child of the stars. It's said to be a Pokémon from another world, but no specific details are known. Even though its helpless, gaseous body can be blown away by the slightest breeze, it doesn't seem to care.
name: Cosmog

description: There's something accumulating around the black core within its hard shell. People think this Pokémon may come from another world. The king who ruled Alola in times of antiquity called it the “cocoon of the stars” and built an altar to worship it.
name: Cosmoem

description: This Pokémon is said to be a male evolution of Cosmog. At the activation of its third eye, it departs for another world. Sometimes the result of its opening an Ultra Wormhole is that energy and life-forms from other worlds are called here to this world.
name: Solgaleo

description: Said to live in another world, this Pokémon devours light, drawing the moonless dark veil of night over the brightness of day. Records of it exist in writings from long, long ago, where it was known by the name “the beast that calls the moon.”
name: Lunala

description: One of the Ultra Beasts. It's unclear whether or not this Pokémon is sentient, but sometimes it can be observed behaving like a young girl. A life-form from another world, it was dubbed a UB and is thought to produce a strong neurotoxin.
name: Nihilego

description: A mysterious life-form called an Ultra Beast. Witnesses saw it pulverize a dump truck with a single punch. Although it's alien to this world and a danger here, it's apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
name: Buzzwole

description: One of the Ultra Beasts. It refuses to touch anything, perhaps because it senses some uncleanness in this world. A life-form that lives in another world, its body is thin and supple, but it also possesses great power.
name: Pheromosa

description: It appeared from the Ultra Wormhole. It raided a power plant, so people think it energizes itself with electricity. Although it's alien to this world and a danger here, it's apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
name: Xurkitree

description: One kind of Ultra Beast. Witnesses have seen it burn down a forest by expelling gas from its two arms. One of the dangerous UBs, high energy readings can be detected coming from both of its huge arms.
name: Celesteela

description: One of the Ultra Beast life-forms, it was observed cutting down a gigantic steel tower with one stroke of its blade. This Ultra Beast's body, which is as thin as paper, is like a sharpened sword.
name: Kartana

description: A dangerous Ultra Beast, it appears to be eating constantly, but for some reason its droppings have never been found. Although it's alien to this world and a danger here, it's apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
name: Guzzlord

description: Light is apparently the source of its energy. It has an extraordinarily vicious disposition and is constantly firing off laser beams. It looks somehow pained as it rages around in search of light, which serves as its energy. It's apparently from another world.
name: Necrozma

variants.description: Reminiscent of the Ultra Beasts, this life-form, apparently asleep underground, is thought to have come from another world in ancient times.  Light is apparently the source of its energy. It has an extraordinarily vicious disposition and is constantly firing off laser beams.  It looks somehow pained as it rages around in search of light, which serves as its energy. It's apparently from another world.  Light is the source of its energy. If it isn't devouring light, impurities build up in it and on it, and Necrozma darkens and stops moving.

This is its form while it is devouring the light of Solgaleo. It pounces on foes and then slashes them with the claws on its four limbs and back.  This is Necrozma's form while it's absorbing the power of Solgaleo, making it extremely ferocious and impossible to control.

Lunala no longer has a will of its own. Now under the control of Necrozma, it continuously expels all of its energy.  This is its form while it's devouring the light of Lunala. It grasps foes in its giant claws and rips them apart with brute force.

This is its form when it has absorbed overwhelming light energy. It fires laser beams from all over its body.  The light pouring out from all over its body affects living things and nature, impacting them in various ways.

description: Its mechanized body is merely a vessel. Its true self is its Soul-Heart, an artificial soul. It synchronizes its consciousness with others to understand their feelings. This faculty makes it useful for taking care of people.
name: Magearna

description: It lurks in the shadows of others, copying their movements and powers. This Pokémon is craven and cowering. It slips into the shadows of others and mimics their powers and movements. As it improves, it becomes stronger than those it's imitating.
name: Marshadow

description: An Ultra Beast that lives in a different world, it cackles wildly as it sprays its opponents with poison from the needles on its head.  This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to be chosen as a first partner in its own world.
name: Poipole

description: One kind of Ultra Beast, it fires a glowing, venomous liquid from its needles. This liquid is also immensely adhesive.
name: Naganadel

description: When stone walls started moving and attacking, the brute's true identity was this mysterious life-form, which brings to mind an Ultra Beast.  It appeared from an Ultra Wormhole. Each one appears to be made up of many life-forms stacked one on top of each other.
name: Stakataka

description: It slithers toward people. Then, without warning, it triggers the explosion of its own head.  An Ultra Beast that appeared from an Ultra Wormhole, it causes explosions, then takes advantage of opponents' surprise to rob them of their vitality.
name: Blacephalon

description: It approaches its enemies at the speed of lightning, then electrifies its claws and tears its opponents apart with them. Even if they dodge its attack, they'll be electrocuted by the flying sparks.
name: Zeraora

description: Most of Meltan's body is made from liquid metal, and its shape is very fluid. It can use its liquid arms and legs to corrode metal and absorb it into its own body. Meltan generates electricity using the metal it absorbs from outside sources. It uses this electricity as an energy source and also as an attack that can be fired from its eye.  Clearly a curious Pokémon, Meltan is very expressive and shows an interest in all kinds of things.
name: Meltan

description: In ancient times, this Pokémon was worshiped for its power to create metal. The bulk of its body is made of liquid metal. Its arms in particular are very flexible, and they can whip forward to deliver devastating punches.
name: Melmetal

variants.description: Revered long ago for its capacity to create iron from nothing, for some reason it has come back to life after 3,000 years. At the end of its life-span, Melmetal will rust and fall apart. The small shards left behind will eventually be reborn as Meltan.  Centrifugal force is behind the punches of Melmetal's heavy hex-nut arms. Melmetal is said to deliver the strongest punches of all Pokémon.

In a distant land, there are legends about a cyclopean giant. In fact, the giant was a Melmetal that was flooded with Gigantamax energy.  It can send electric beams streaking out from the hole in its belly. The beams' tremendous energy can vaporize an opponent in one shot.

description: When it uses its special stick to strike up a beat, the sound waves produced carry revitalizing energy to the plants and flowers in the area.  It attacks with rapid beats of its stick. As it strikes with amazing speed, it gets more and more pumped.
name: Grookey

description: The faster a Thwackey can beat out a rhythm with its two sticks, the more respect it wins from its peers.  When it's drumming out rapid beats in battle, it gets so caught up in the rhythm that it won't even notice that it's already knocked out its opponent.
name: Thwackey

description: By drumming, it taps into the power of its special tree stump. The roots of the stump follow its direction in battle.  The one with the best drumming techniques becomes the boss of the troop. It has a gentle disposition and values harmony among its group.
name: Rillaboom

variants.description: By drumming, it taps into the power of its special tree stump. The roots of the stump follow its direction in battle.  The one with the best drumming techniques becomes the boss of the troop. It has a gentle disposition and values harmony among its group.

Gigantamax energy has caused Rillaboom's stump to grow into a drum set that resembles a forest.  Rillaboom has become one with its forest of drums and continues to lay down beats that shake all of Galar.

description: A warm-up of running around gets fire energy coursing through this Pokémon's body. Once that happens, it's ready to fight at full power.  It has special pads on the backs of its feet, and one on its nose. Once it's raring to fight, these pads radiate tremendous heat.
name: Scorbunny

description: Its thick and fluffy fur protects it from the cold and enables it to use hotter fire moves.  It kicks berries right off the branches of trees and then juggles them with its feet, practicing its footwork.
name: Raboot

description: It juggles a pebble with its feet, turning it into a burning soccer ball. Its shots strike opponents hard and leave them scorched.  It's skilled at both offense and defense, and it gets pumped up when cheered on. But if it starts showboating, it could put itself in a tough spot.
name: Cinderace

variants.description: It juggles a pebble with its feet, turning it into a burning soccer ball. Its shots strike opponents hard and leave them scorched.  It's skilled at both offense and defense, and it gets pumped up when cheered on. But if it starts showboating, it could put itself in a tough spot.

Infused with Cinderace's fighting spirit, the gigantic Pyro Ball never misses its targets and completely roasts opponents.  Gigantamax energy can sometimes cause the diameter of this Pokémon's fireball to exceed 300 feet.

description: When scared, this Pokémon cries. Its tears pack the chemical punch of 100 onions, and attackers won't be able to resist weeping.  When it gets wet, its skin changes color, and this Pokémon becomes invisible as if it were camouflaged.
name: Sobble

description: A clever combatant, this Pokémon battles using water balloons created with moisture secreted from its palms.  Highly intelligent but also very lazy, it keeps enemies out of its territory by laying traps everywhere.
name: Drizzile

description: It has many hidden capabilities, such as fingertips that can shoot water and a membrane on its back that it can use to glide through the air.  Its nictitating membranes let it pick out foes' weak points so it can precisely blast them with water that shoots from its fingertips at Mach 3.
name: Inteleon

variants.description: It has many hidden capabilities, such as fingertips that can shoot water and a membrane on its back that it can use to glide through the air.  Its nictitating membranes let it pick out foes' weak points so it can precisely blast them with water that shoots from its fingertips at Mach 3.

Gigantamax Inteleon's Water Gun move fires at Mach 7. As the Pokémon takes aim, it uses the crest on its head to gauge wind and temperature.  It has excellent sniping skills. Shooting a berry rolling along over nine miles away is a piece of cake for this Pokémon.

description: Found throughout the Galar region, this Pokémon becomes uneasy if its cheeks are ever completely empty of berries.  It eats berries nonstop - a habit that has made it more resilient than it looks. It'll show up on farms, searching for yet more berries.
name: Skwovet

description: It stashes berries in its tail - so many berries that they fall out constantly. But this Pokémon is a bit slow-witted, so it doesn't notice the loss.  Common throughout the Galar region, this Pokémon has strong teeth and can chew through the toughest of berry shells.
name: Greedent

description: It will bravely challenge any opponent, no matter how powerful. This Pokémon benefits from every battle - even a defeat increases its strength a bit.  Jumping nimbly about, this small-bodied Pokémon takes advantage of even the slightest opportunity to disorient larger opponents.
name: Rookidee

description: Smart enough to use tools in battle, these Pokémon have been seen picking up rocks and flinging them or using ropes to wrap up enemies.  The lessons of many harsh battles have taught it how to accurately judge an opponent's strength.
name: Corvisquire

description: This Pokémon reigns supreme in the skies of the Galar region. The black luster of its steel body could drive terror into the heart of any foe.  With their great intellect and flying skills, these Pokémon very successfully act as the Galar region's airborne taxi service.
name: Corviknight

variants.description: This Pokémon reigns supreme in the skies of the Galar region. The black luster of its steel body could drive terror into the heart of any foe.  With their great intellect and flying skills, these Pokémon very successfully act as the Galar region's airborne taxi service.

Imbued with Gigantamax energy, its wings can whip up winds more forceful than any a hurricane could muster. The gusts blow everything away.  The eight feathers on its back are called blade birds, and they can launch off its body to attack foes independently.

description: A constant collector of information, this Pokémon is very smart. Very strong is what it isn't.  Often found in gardens, this Pokémon has hairs on its body that it uses to assess its surroundings.
name: Blipbug

description: It barely moves, but it's still alive. Hiding in its shell without food or water seems to have awakened its psychic powers.  As it grows inside its shell, it uses its psychic abilities to monitor the outside world and prepare for evolution.
name: Dottler

description: It's famous for its high level of intelligence, and the large size of its brain is proof that it also possesses immense psychic power.  It emits psychic energy to observe and study what's around it - and what's around it can include things over six miles away.
name: Orbeetle

variants.description: It's famous for its high level of intelligence, and the large size of its brain is proof that it also possesses immense psychic power.  It emits psychic energy to observe and study what's around it - and what's around it can include things over six miles away.

Its brain has grown to a gargantuan size, as has the rest of its body. This Pokémon's intellect and psychic abilities are overpowering.  If it were to utilize every last bit of its power, it could control the minds of every living being in its vicinity.

description: Aided by the soft pads on its feet, it silently raids the food stores of other Pokémon. It survives off its ill-gotten gains.  Cunning and cautious, this Pokémon survives by stealing food from others. It erases its tracks with swipes of its tail as it makes off with its plunder.
name: Nickit

description: It secretly marks potential targets with a scent. By following the scent, it stalks its targets and steals from them when they least expect it.  With a lithe body and sharp claws, it goes around stealing food and eggs. Boltund is its natural enemy.
name: Thievul

description: It anchors itself in the ground with its single leg, then basks in the sun. After absorbing enough sunlight, its petals spread as it blooms brilliantly.  It whirls around in the wind while singing a joyous song. This delightful display has charmed many into raising this Pokémon.
name: Gossifleur

description: The seeds attached to its cotton fluff are full of nutrients. It spreads them on the wind so that plants and other Pokémon can benefit from them.  The cotton on the head of this Pokémon can be spun into a glossy, gorgeous yarn - a Galar regional specialty.
name: Eldegoss

description: Its curly fleece is such an effective cushion that this Pokémon could fall off a cliff and stand right back up at the bottom, unharmed.  If its fleece grows too long, Wooloo won't be able to move. Cloth made with the wool of this Pokémon is surprisingly strong.
name: Wooloo

description: Weave a carpet from its springy wool, and you end up with something closer to a trampoline. You'll start to bounce the moment you set foot on it.  Its majestic horns are meant only to impress the opposite gender. They never see use in battle.
name: Dubwool

description: Apparently the itch of its teething impels it to snap its jaws at anything in front of it.  It starts off battles by attacking with its rock-hard horn, but as soon as the opponent flinches, this Pokémon bites down and never lets go.
name: Chewtle

description: With jaws that can shear through steel rods, this highly aggressive Pokémon chomps down on its unfortunate prey.  This Pokémon rapidly extends its retractable neck to sink its sharp fangs into distant enemies and take them down.
name: Drednaw

variants.description: With jaws that can shear through steel rods, this highly aggressive Pokémon chomps down on its unfortunate prey.  This Pokémon rapidly extends its retractable neck to sink its sharp fangs into distant enemies and take them down.

It responded to Gigantamax energy by becoming bipedal. First it comes crashing down on foes, and then it finishes them off with its massive jaws.  In the Galar region, there's a tale about this Pokémon chewing up a mountain and using the rubble to stop a flood.

description: This Pokémon is very popular as a herding dog in the Galar region. As it runs, it generates electricity from the base of its tail.  This gluttonous Pokémon only assists people with their work because it wants treats. As it runs, it crackles with electricity.
name: Yamper

description: This Pokémon generates electricity and channels it into its legs to keep them going strong. Boltund can run nonstop for three full days.  It sends electricity through its legs to boost their strength. Running at top speed, it easily breaks 50 mph.
name: Boltund

description: Most of its body has the same composition as coal. Fittingly, this Pokémon was first discovered in coal mines about 400 years ago.  It can race around like a unicycle, even on rough, rocky terrain. Burning coal sustains it.
name: Rolycoly

description: It forms coal inside its body. Coal dropped by this Pokémon once helped fuel the lives of people in the Galar region.  By rapidly rolling its legs, it can travel at over 18 mph. The temperature of the flames it breathes exceeds 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit.
name: Carkol

description: It's usually peaceful, but the vandalism of mines enrages it. Offenders will be incinerated with flames that reach 2,700 degrees Fahrenheit.  While it's engaged in battle, its mountain of coal will burn bright red, sending off sparks that scorch the surrounding area.
name: Coalossal

variants.description: It's usually peaceful, but the vandalism of mines enrages it. Offenders will be incinerated with flames that reach 2,700 degrees Fahrenheit.  While it's engaged in battle, its mountain of coal will burn bright red, sending off sparks that scorch the surrounding area.

Its body is a colossal stove. With Gigantamax energy stoking the fire, this Pokémon's flame burns hotter than 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.  When Galar was hit by a harsh cold wave, this Pokémon served as a giant heating stove and saved many lives.

description: It spends its entire life inside an apple. It hides from its natural enemies, bird Pokémon, by pretending it's just an apple and nothing more.  As soon as it's born, it burrows into an apple. Not only does the apple serve as its food source, but the flavor of the fruit determines its evolution.
name: Applin

description: It ate a sour apple, and that induced its evolution. In its cheeks, it stores an acid capable of causing chemical burns.  It flies on wings of apple skin and spits a powerful acid. It can also change its shape into that of an apple.
name: Flapple

variants.description: It ate a sour apple, and that induced its evolution. In its cheeks, it stores an acid capable of causing chemical burns.  It flies on wings of apple skin and spits a powerful acid. It can also change its shape into that of an apple.

Under the influence of Gigantamax energy, it produces much more sweet nectar, and its shape has changed to resemble a giant apple.  If it stretches its neck, the strong aroma of its nectar pours out. The scent is so sickeningly sweet that one whiff makes other Pokémon faint.

description: Eating a sweet apple caused its evolution. A nectarous scent wafts from its body, luring in the bug Pokémon it preys on.  Its body is covered in sweet nectar, and the skin on its back is especially yummy. Children used to have it as a snack.
name: Appletun

description: As it digs, it swallows sand and stores it in its neck pouch. The pouch can hold more than 17 pounds of sand.  It spews sand from its nostrils. While the enemy is blinded, it burrows into the ground to hide.
name: Silicobra

description: When it contracts its body, over 220 pounds of sand sprays from its nose. If it ever runs out of sand, it becomes disheartened.  Its unique style of coiling allows it to blast sand out of its sand sac more efficiently.
name: Sandaconda

variants.description: When it contracts its body, over 220 pounds of sand sprays from its nose. If it ever runs out of sand, it becomes disheartened.  Its unique style of coiling allows it to blast sand out of its sand sac more efficiently.

Its sand pouch has grown to tremendous proportions. More than 1,000,000 tons of sand now swirl around its body.  Sand swirls around its body with such speed and power that it could pulverize a skyscraper.

description: It's so strong that it can knock out some opponents in a single hit, but it also may forget what it's battling midfight.  This hungry Pokémon swallows Arrokuda whole. Occasionally, it makes a mistake and tries to swallow a Pokémon other than its preferred prey.
name: Cramorant

description: If it sees any movement around it, this Pokémon charges for it straightaway, leading with its sharply pointed jaw. It's very proud of that jaw.  After it's eaten its fill, its movements become extremely sluggish. That's when Cramorant swallows it up.
name: Arrokuda

description: This Pokémon has a jaw that's as sharp as a spear and as strong as steel. Apparently Barraskewda's flesh is surprisingly tasty, too.  It spins its tail fins to propel itself, surging forward at speeds of over 100 knots before ramming prey and spearing into them.
name: Barraskewda

description: It stores poison in an internal poison sac and secretes that poison through its skin. If you touch this Pokémon, a tingling sensation follows.  It manipulates the chemical makeup of its poison to produce electricity. The voltage is weak, but it can cause a tingling paralysis.
name: Toxel

description: When this Pokémon sounds as if it's strumming a guitar, it's actually clawing at the protrusions on its chest to generate electricity.  This short-tempered and aggressive Pokémon chugs stagnant water to absorb any toxins it might contain.
name: Toxtricity

variants.description: When this Pokémon sounds as if it's strumming a guitar, it's actually clawing at the protrusions on its chest to generate electricity.  This short-tempered and aggressive Pokémon chugs stagnant water to absorb any toxins it might contain.

Capable of generating 15,000 volts of electricity, this Pokémon looks down on all that would challenge it.  It has an electrical organ on its chest. While generating electricity, it fills its surroundings with what sounds like the strumming of a bass guitar.

Its excessive electric energy is its weapon. This Pokémon can build up more electricity than any thundercloud.  Out of control after its own poison penetrated its brain, it tears across the land in a rampage, contaminating the earth with toxic sweat.

description: It stores flammable gas in its body and uses it to generate heat. The yellow sections on its belly get particularly hot.  It wraps prey up with its heated body, cooking them in its coils. Once they're well-done, it will voraciously nibble them down to the last morsel.
name: Sizzlipede

description: When it heats up, its body temperature reaches about 1,500 degrees Fahrenheit. It lashes its body like a whip and launches itself at enemies.  While its burning body is already dangerous on its own, this excessively hostile Pokémon also has large and very sharp fangs.
name: Centiskorch

variants.description: When it heats up, its body temperature reaches about 1,500 degrees Fahrenheit. It lashes its body like a whip and launches itself at enemies.  While its burning body is already dangerous on its own, this excessively hostile Pokémon also has large and very sharp fangs.

Gigantamax energy has evoked a rise in its body temperature, now reaching over 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit. Its heat waves incinerate its enemies.  The heat that comes off a Gigantamax Centiskorch may destabilize air currents. Sometimes it can even cause storms.

description: It's very curious, but its means of investigating things is to try to punch them with its tentacles. The search for food is what brings it onto land.  Its tentacles tear off easily, but it isn't alarmed when that happens - it knows they'll grow back. It's about as smart as a three-year-old.
name: Clobbopus

description: A body made up of nothing but muscle makes the grappling moves this Pokémon performs with its tentacles tremendously powerful.  Searching for an opponent to test its skills against, it emerges onto land. Once the battle is over, it returns to the sea.
name: Grapploct

description: This Pokémon is said to have been born when a lonely spirit possessed a cold, leftover cup of tea.  The teacup in which this Pokémon makes its home is a famous piece of antique tableware. Many forgeries are in circulation.
name: Sinistea

description: This species lives in antique teapots. Most pots are forgeries, but on rare occasions, an authentic work is found.  Leaving leftover black tea unattended is asking for this Pokémon to come along and pour itself into it, turning the tea into a new Polteageist.
name: Polteageist

description: Via the protrusion on its head, it senses other creatures' emotions. If you don't have a calm disposition, it will never warm up to you.  If this Pokémon senses a strong emotion, it will run away as fast as it can. It prefers areas without people.
name: Hatenna

description: No matter who you are, if you bring strong emotions near this Pokémon, it will silence you violently.  Using the braids on its head, it pummels foes to get them to quiet down. One blow from those braids would knock out a professional boxer.
name: Hattrem

description: It emits psychic power strong enough to cause headaches as a deterrent to the approach of others.  If you're too loud around it, you risk being torn apart by the claws on its tentacle. This Pokémon is also known as the Forest Witch.
name: Hatterene

variants.description: It emits psychic power strong enough to cause headaches as a deterrent to the approach of others.  If you're too loud around it, you risk being torn apart by the claws on its tentacle. This Pokémon is also known as the Forest Witch.

This Pokémon can read the emotions of creatures over 30 miles away. The minute it senses hostility, it goes on the attack.  Beams like lightning shoot down from its tentacles. It's known to some as the Raging Goddess.

description: Through its nose, it sucks in the emanations produced by people and Pokémon when they feel annoyed. It thrives off this negative energy.  It sneaks into people's homes, stealing things and feasting on the negative energy of the frustrated occupants.
name: Impidimp

description: When it gets down on all fours as if to beg for forgiveness, it's trying to lure opponents in so that it can stab them with its spear-like hair.  With sly cunning, it tries to lure people into the woods. Some believe it to have the power to make crops grow.
name: Morgrem

description: With the hair wrapped around its body helping to enhance its muscles, this Pokémon can overwhelm even Machamp.  Its hairs work like muscle fibers. When its hairs unfurl, they latch on to opponents, ensnaring them as tentacles would.
name: Grimmsnarl

variants.description: With the hair wrapped around its body helping to enhance its muscles, this Pokémon can overwhelm even Machamp.  Its hairs work like muscle fibers. When its hairs unfurl, they latch on to opponents, ensnaring them as tentacles would.

By transforming its leg hair, this Pokémon delivers power-packed drill kicks that can bore huge holes in Galar's terrain.  Gigantamax energy has caused more hair to sprout all over its body. With the added strength, it can jump over the world's tallest building.

description: Its voice is staggering in volume. Obstagoon has a tendency to take on a threatening posture and shout - this move is known as Obstruct.  It evolved after experiencing numerous fights. While crossing its arms, it lets out a shout that would make any opponent flinch.
name: Obstagoon

description: What appears to be an iron helmet is actually hardened hair. This Pokémon lives for the thrill of battle.  After many battles, it evolved dangerous claws that come together to form daggers when extended.
name: Perrserker

description: Its shell is overflowing with its heightened otherworldly energy. The ectoplasm serves as protection for this Pokémon's core spirit.  Be cautious of the ectoplasmic body surrounding its soul. You'll become stiff as stone if you touch it.
name: Cursola

description: Only Farfetch'd that have survived many battles can attain this evolution. When this Pokémon's leek withers, it will retire from combat.  After deflecting attacks with its hard leaf shield, it strikes back with its sharp leek stalk. The leek stalk is both weapon and food.
name: Sirfetch'd

description: It's highly skilled at tap-dancing. It waves its cane of ice in time with its graceful movements.  Its amusing movements make it very popular. It releases its psychic power from the pattern on its belly.
name: Mr. Rime

description: A powerful curse was woven into an ancient painting. After absorbing the spirit of a Yamask, the painting began to move.  Never touch its shadowlike body, or you'll be shown the horrific memories behind the picture carved into it.
name: Runerigus

description: This Pokémon was born from sweet-smelling particles in the air. Its body is made of cream.  They say that any patisserie visited by Milcery is guaranteed success and good fortune.
name: Milcery

description: When it trusts a Trainer, it will treat them to berries it's decorated with cream.  When Alcremie is content, the cream it secretes from its hands becomes sweeter and richer.
name: Alcremie

variants.description: When it trusts a Trainer, it will treat them to berries it's decorated with cream.  When Alcremie is content, the cream it secretes from its hands becomes sweeter and richer.

Cream pours endlessly from this Pokémon's body. The cream stiffens when compressed by an impact. A harder impact results in harder cream.  It launches swarms of missiles, each made of cream and loaded with 100,000 kilocalories. Get hit by one of these, and your head will swim.

description: Five of them are troopers, and one is the brass. The brass's orders are absolute.  The six of them work together as one Pokémon. Teamwork is also their battle strategy, and they constantly change their formation as they fight.
name: Falinks

description: It feeds on seaweed, using its teeth to scrape it off rocks. Electric current flows from the tips of its spines.  It stores electricity in each spine. Even if one gets broken off, it still continues to emit electricity for at least three hours.
name: Pincurchin

description: It spits out thread imbued with a frigid sort of energy and uses it to tie its body to branches, disguising itself as an icicle while it sleeps.  It eats snow that piles up on the ground. The more snow it eats, the bigger and more impressive the spikes on its back grow.
name: Snom

description: Icy scales fall from its wings like snow as it flies over fields and mountains. The temperature of its wings is less than -290 degrees Fahrenheit.  It shows no mercy to any who desecrate fields and mountains. It will fly around on its icy wings, causing a blizzard to chase offenders away.
name: Frosmoth

description: It stands in grasslands, watching the sun's descent from zenith to horizon. This Pokémon has a talent for delivering dynamic kicks.  Once a year, on a specific date and at a specific time, they gather out of nowhere and form up in a circle.
name: Stonjourner

description: It drifted in on the flow of ocean waters from a frigid place. It keeps its head iced constantly to make sure it stays nice and cold.  This Pokémon keeps its heat-sensitive head cool with ice. It fishes for its food, dangling its single hair into the sea to lure in prey.
name: Eiscue

variants.description: It drifted in on the flow of ocean waters from a frigid place. It keeps its head iced constantly to make sure it stays nice and cold.  This Pokémon keeps its heat-sensitive head cool with ice. It fishes for its food, dangling its single hair into the sea to lure in prey.

The ice covering this Pokémon's face has shattered, revealing a slightly worried expression that many people are enamored with.  The hair on its head connects to the surface of its brain. When this Pokémon has something on its mind, its hair chills the air around it.

description: It uses the horns on its head to sense the emotions of others. Males will act as valets for those they serve, looking after their every need. Through its horns, it can pick up on the emotions of creatures around it. Positive emotions are the source of its strength.
name: Indeedee

variants.description: It uses the horns on its head to sense the emotions of others. Males will act as valets for those they serve, looking after their every need. Through its horns, it can pick up on the emotions of creatures around it. Positive emotions are the source of its strength.

These intelligent Pokémon touch horns with each other to share information between them.  They diligently serve people and Pokémon so they can gather feelings of gratitude. The females are particularly good at babysitting.

description: As it eats the seeds stored up in its pocket-like pouches, this Pokémon is not just satisfying its constant hunger. It's also generating electricity.  It carries electrically roasted seeds with it as if they're precious treasures. No matter how much it eats, it always gets hungry again in short order.
name: Morpeko

variants.description: As it eats the seeds stored up in its pocket-like pouches, this Pokémon is not just satisfying its constant hunger. It's also generating electricity.  It carries electrically roasted seeds with it as if they're precious treasures. No matter how much it eats, it always gets hungry again in short order.

Intense hunger drives it to extremes of violence, and the electricity in its cheek sacs has converted into a Dark-type energy. Hunger hormones affect its temperament. Until its hunger is appeased, it gets up to all manner of evil deeds.

description: It digs up the ground with its trunk. It's also very strong, being able to carry loads of over five tons without any problem at all.  If a job requires serious strength, this Pokémon will excel at it. Its copper body tarnishes in the rain, turning a vibrant green color.
name: Cufant

description: They came over from another region long ago and worked together with humans. Their green skin is resistant to water.  These Pokémon live in herds. Their trunks have incredible grip strength, strong enough to crush giant rocks into powder.
name: Copperajah

variants.description: They came over from another region long ago and worked together with humans. Their green skin is resistant to water.  These Pokémon live in herds. Their trunks have incredible grip strength, strong enough to crush giant rocks into powder.

So much power is packed within its trunk that if it were to unleash that power, the resulting blast could level mountains and change the landscape.  After this Pokémon has Gigantamaxed, its massive nose can utterly demolish large structures with a single smashing blow.

description: In ancient times, it was unbeatable thanks to its powerful lower body, but it went extinct anyway after it depleted all its plant-based food sources.  The powerful muscles in its tail generate its electricity. Compared to its lower body, its upper half is entirely too small.
name: Dracozolt

description: The shaking of its freezing upper half is what generates its electricity. It has a hard time walking around.  This Pokémon lived on prehistoric seashores and was able to preserve food with the ice on its body. It went extinct because it moved so slowly.
name: Arctozolt

description: Powerful legs and jaws made it the apex predator of its time. Its own overhunting of its prey was what drove it to extinction.  Its mighty legs are capable of running at speeds exceeding 40 mph, but this Pokémon can't breathe unless it's underwater.
name: Dracovish

description: Though it's able to capture prey by freezing its surroundings, it has trouble eating the prey afterward because its mouth is on top of its head.  The skin on its face is impervious to attack, but breathing difficulties made this Pokémon go extinct anyway.
name: Arctovish

description: Its body resembles polished metal, and it's both lightweight and strong. The only drawback is that it rusts easily.  The special metal that composes its body is very light, so this Pokémon has considerable agility. It lives in caves because it dislikes the rain.
name: Duraludon

variants.description: Its body resembles polished metal, and it's both lightweight and strong. The only drawback is that it rusts easily.  The special metal that composes its body is very light, so this Pokémon has considerable agility. It lives in caves because it dislikes the rain.

It's grown to resemble a skyscraper. Parts of its towering body glow due to a profusion of energy.  The hardness of its cells is exceptional, even among Steel types. It also has a body structure that's resistant to earthquakes.

description: After being reborn as a ghost Pokémon, Dreepy wanders the areas it used to inhabit back when it was alive in prehistoric seas.  If this weak Pokémon is by itself, a mere child could defeat it. But if Dreepy has friends to help it train, it can evolve and become much stronger.
name: Dreepy

description: It's capable of flying faster than 120 mph. It battles alongside Dreepy and dotes on them until they successfully evolve.  Without a Dreepy to place on its head and care for, it gets so uneasy it'll try to substitute any Pokémon it finds for the missing Dreepy.
name: Drakloak

description: When it isn't battling, it keeps Dreepy in the holes on its horns. Once a fight starts, it launches the Dreepy like supersonic missiles.  Apparently the Dreepy inside Dragapult's horns eagerly look forward to being launched out at Mach speeds.
name: Dragapult

description: Known as a legendary hero, this Pokémon absorbs metal particles, transforming them into a weapon it uses to battle.  This Pokémon has slumbered for many years. Some say it's Zamazenta's elder sister - others say the two Pokémon are rivals.
name: Zacian

variants.description: Now armed with a weapon it used in ancient times, this Pokémon needs only a single strike to fell even Gigantamax Pokémon. Able to cut down anything with a single strike, it became known as the Fairy King's Sword, and it inspired awe in friend and foe alike.

Known as a legendary hero, this Pokémon absorbs metal particles, transforming them into a weapon it uses to battle.  This Pokémon has slumbered for many years. Some say it's Zamazenta's elder sister - others say the two Pokémon are rivals.

description: In times past, it worked together with a king of the people to save the Galar region. It absorbs metal that it then uses in battle.  This Pokémon slept for aeons while in the form of a statue. It was asleep for so long, people forgot that it ever existed.
name: Zamazenta

variants.description: Its ability to deflect any attack led to it being known as the Fighting Master's Shield. It was feared and respected by all. Now that it's equipped with its shield, it can shrug off impressive blows, including the attacks of Dynamax Pokémon.

In times past, it worked together with a king of the people to save the Galar region. It absorbs metal that it then uses in battle.  This Pokémon slept for aeons while in the form of a statue. It was asleep for so long, people forgot that it ever existed.

description: The core on its chest absorbs energy emanating from the lands of the Galar region. This energy is what allows Eternatus to stay active.  It was inside a meteorite that fell 20,000 years ago. There seems to be a connection between this Pokémon and the Dynamax phenomenon.
name: Eternatus

variants.description: The core on its chest absorbs energy emanating from the lands of the Galar region. This energy is what allows Eternatus to stay active.  It was inside a meteorite that fell 20,000 years ago. There seems to be a connection between this Pokémon and the Dynamax phenomenon.

As a result of Rose's meddling, Eternatus absorbed all the energy in the Galar region. It's now in a state of power overload.  Infinite amounts of energy pour from this Pokémon's enlarged core, warping the surrounding space-time.

description: Kubfu trains hard to perfect its moves. The moves it masters will determine which form it takes when it evolves.  If Kubfu pulls the long white hair on its head, its fighting spirit heightens and power wells up from the depths of its belly.
name: Kubfu

description: This form of Urshifu is a strong believer in the one-hit KO. Its strategy is to leap in close to foes and land a devastating blow with a hardened fist. Inhabiting the mountains of a distant region, this Pokémon races across sheer cliffs, training its legs and refining its moves.
name: Urshifu

variants.description: This form of Urshifu is a strong believer in the one-hit KO. Its strategy is to leap in close to foes and land a devastating blow with a hardened fist. Inhabiting the mountains of a distant region, this Pokémon races across sheer cliffs, training its legs and refining its moves.

It's believed that this Pokémon modeled its fighting style on the flow of a river—sometimes rapid, sometimes calm.  This form of Urshifu is a strong believer in defeating foes by raining many blows down on them. Its strikes are nonstop, flowing like a river.

People call it the embodiment of rage. It's said that this Pokémon's terrifying expression and shout will rid the world of malevolence. The energy released by this Pokémon's fists forms shock waves that can blow away Dynamax Pokémon in just one hit.

As it waits for the right moment to unleash its Gigantamax power, this Pokémon maintains a perfect one-legged stance. It won't even twitch.  All it takes is a glare from this Pokémon to take the lives of those with evil in their hearts—or so they say.

description: Within dense forests, this Pokémon lives in a pack with others of its kind. It's incredibly aggressive, and the other Pokémon of the forest fear it. Once the vines on Zarude's body tear off, they become nutrients in the soil. This helps the plants of the forest grow.
name: Zarude

variants.description: Within dense forests, this Pokémon lives in a pack with others of its kind. It's incredibly aggressive, and the other Pokémon of the forest fear it. Once the vines on Zarude's body tear off, they become nutrients in the soil. This helps the plants of the forest grow.

This Zarude left its pack to raise a human child. The cloth Zarude would wrap the child with has a comforting scent that calmed the child's crying.  This Zarude's special strength stems from its love and care for an orphaned human child that the Pokémon has raised since the child's infancy.

description: This Pokémon is a cluster of electrical energy. It's said that removing the rings on Regieleki's body will unleash the Pokémon's latent power. Its entire body is made up of a single organ that generates electrical energy. Regieleki is capable of creating all Galar's electricity.
name: Regieleki

description: An academic theory proposes that Regidrago's arms were once the head of an ancient dragon Pokémon. The theory remains unproven.  Its body is composed of crystallized dragon energy. Regidrago is said to have the powers of every dragon Pokémon.
name: Regidrago

description: Glastrier emits intense cold from its hooves. It's also a belligerent Pokémon—anything it wants, it takes by force.  Glastrier has tremendous physical strength, and the mask of ice covering its face is 100 times harder than diamond.
name: Glastrier

description: It probes its surroundings with all its senses save one - it doesn't use its sense of sight. Spectrier's kicks are said to separate soul from body. As it dashes through the night, Spectrier absorbs the life-force of sleeping creatures. It craves silence and solitude.
name: Spectrier

description: Calyrex is a merciful Pokémon, capable of providing healing and blessings. It reigned over the Galar region in times of yore. Calyrex is known in legend as a king that ruled over Galar in ancient times. It has the power to cause hearts to mend and plants to spring forth.
name: Calyrex

variants.description: Calyrex is a merciful Pokémon, capable of providing healing and blessings. It reigned over the Galar region in times of yore. Calyrex is known in legend as a king that ruled over Galar in ancient times. It has the power to cause hearts to mend and plants to spring forth.

According to lore, this Pokémon showed no mercy to those who got in its way, yet it would heal its opponents' wounds after battle.  It's said that this Pokémon once moved a large forest—and all the Pokémon living there—to a new location overnight.

It's said that Calyrex and a Pokémon that had bonded with it ran all across the Galar region to bring green to the wastelands.  Legend says that by using its power to see all events from past to future, this Pokémon saved the creatures of a forest from a meteorite strike.

description: The black orbs shine with an uncanny light when the Pokémon is erecting invisible barriers. The fur shed from its beard retains heat well and is a highly useful material for winter clothing.
name: Wyrdeer

description: A violent creature that fells towering trees with its crude axes and shields itself with hard stone. If one should chance upon this Pokémon in the wilds, one's only recourse is to flee.
name: Kleavor

description: I believe it was Hisui’s swampy terrain that gave Ursaluna its burly physique and newfound capacity to manipulate peat at will.
name: Ursaluna

description: Clads itself in the souls of comrades that perished before fulfilling their goals of journeying upstream. No other species throughout all Hisui’s rivers is Basculegion’s equal.
name: Basculegion

description: Because of Sneasler’s virulent poison and daunting physical prowess, no other species could hope to best it on the frozen highlands. Preferring solitude, this species does not form packs.
name: Sneasler

description: Its lancelike spikes and savage temperament have earned it the nickname “sea fiend.” It slurps up poison to nourish itself.
name: Overqwil

description: When it flies to this land from across the sea, the bitter winter comes to an end. According to legend, this Pokémon’s love gives rise to the budding of fresh life across Hisui.
name: Enamorus

variants.description: When it flies to this land from across the sea, the bitter winter comes to an end. According to legend, this Pokémon’s love gives rise to the budding of fresh life across Hisui.
A different guise from its feminine humanoid form. From the clouds, it descends upon those who treat any form of life with disrespect and metes out wrathful, ruthless punishment.

description: Cuboo cherishes the bamboo stalk it carries dearly; if it loses it, it grows extremely depressed. It uses the bamboo as a weapon, as well as a food source, whacking opponents with it before taking a bite from it moments later.
name: Cuboo

description: It uses its bamboo stalk both as a weapon and as a source of nourishmment. Surprisingly nimble, it attacks swiftly with its bamboo stalk. Even if its stalk snaps, it will continue to use the broken halves.
name: Ninda

description: Its bamboo stalk is its most prized possession. If it is damaged, it flies into a rage until it gets a new one. Its skills with its stalk is unmatched. It is able to single-handedly take down six opponents at once with little effort.
name: Pandaolin

description: Sizzabre's mane is very warm to the touch. They snuggle close to their trainers and other Pokémon to help warm them up when it's cold. Their fangs can snap easily if they are not careful in battle. Ehen this happens, they run off to find hard objects in order to sharpen them again.
name: Sizzabre

description: They have a very belligerent nature. It takes a long time for them to trust others. After sinking their fangs into opponents, they heat up their teeth, causing excruciating pain.
name: Saburn

description: Extremely aggressive and temperamental, it takes an extremely talented trainer to successfully gain its trust. It never forgets who has wronged it. Their saliva is very hot, as are their large teeth, so a bite from it can cause severe burns in an instant.
name: Blazabre

description: Platyke prefer water that is at a very low temperature; warm water makes them very uncomfortable. You can look at it fin to determine its mood. If its fin is drooping, it is either sad or sick, while it is upright when it is angry.
name: Platyke

description: This Pokémon enjoys swimming deep below sea level and absorbing the frigid, salty water through the gills on its fin. The icicle in its chest is connected to its heart, which allows its body to survive for months in extremely frigid water.
name: Platypund

description: This Pokémon can freeze an entire pond with one touch. Its entire body is covered in substance that allows it to live in very frigid conditions.
name: Platygue

description: These Pokémon love digging for things underground. They have internal ears that they use to listen far away.
name: Zokorode

description: Its body is very bulky, allowing it to protect itself from injury while battling or digging. They use their single tooth to dig at high speeds.
name: Rokozin

description: Bulbloom spend majority of their time hanging from trees, absorbing the nutrients needed for their evolution. They inhabit gardens and help plants grow by prodding them with their vines, sharing the nutrients.
name: Bulbloom

description: It dances around gardens and plains, spreading pollen that aids in the growth of flowers. When it sees a dying plant, it uses its vine to completely revitalize it.
name: Blossunia

description: This Pokémon glides using the single wing on its back that also acts as a warning sign. Its colors tell predators to stay away although it is not poisonous.
name: Glydar

description: Using its eerie wing, this Pokémon spends its time gliding throughout the night, devouring other bugs. It is able to shoot webs from its front and back ends.
name: Airaknid

description: They are able to manipulate their bodies on a molecular level in order to transform into other Pokémon and even humans! Their powers are very weak, so their transformations tend to not last that long.
name: Mimadge

description: These Pokémon are known for their unique ability to change their bodies, at a molecular structure, at will. They change into different Pokémon, and even humans, and lie to unsuspecting victims, usually leading to the victim's bodily harm.
name: Badgeange

description: Kwarzite are highly recognized by the crystal on its head. They receive their energy by eating large amounts of minerals.
name: Kwarzite

description: These Pokémon's crystals are extremely valuable, as they glow white according to emotion. They are sought by miners because they are known to know where the rarest minerals are located.
name: Mortierok

description: These Pokémon are known to guard precious and valuable crystals in caves and mountains by firing rocks at intruders. Their durable, sturdy bodies are able to deflect different attacks.
name: Cragmodon

description: It creates its own energy by absorbing sunlight through the leaves on its back and tail. They typically reside at the tops of trees so that they are able to blend in with their surroundings and be closer to the sun.
name: Eftini

description: Their tails are so long that in order to not be grabbed or caught by something, it wraps it around its neck like a scarf. Their tails are extremely strong, being able to cause small tremors with a single slam.
name: Sireft

description: If the crust on its back vibrates, it is a sign that an earthquake is going to occur. They are sometimes called 'Forest Facilitators' because of their authoritative personalities.
name: Tefrin

description: They spend most of their times playfully wrestling each other in tree tops. They love to snack on leaves that grow from special trees. The Eukawala in Cotue are much more aggressive, picking fights with any other Pokémon that crosses their path. They are mostly nocturnal, raiding the dens of sleeping Pokémon for food.
name: Eukawala

variants.description: They spend most of their times playfully wrestling each other in tree tops. They love to snack on leaves that grow from special trees.
The Eukawala in Cotue are much more aggressive, picking fights with any other Pokémon that crosses their path. They are mostly nocturnal, raiding the dens of sleeping Pokémon for food.

description: They train themselves daily by punching trees and rocks. They are excitable Pokémon that enjoy the thrill of fighting and snack on shrubs for nutrition.
name: Kowallop

description: They are often seen flying around power plants at night. It can cause electronic devices to malfunction just by flying next to them.
name: Blitzat

description: They are able to electrify their claws in order to paralyze opponents with slashes. It apparently has the ability to drain the electrons from your atoms.
name: Thudat

description: If you breathe in the spores emitted from this Pokémon, you will have excruciating headaches. After breathing in the spores, you experience many hallucinations.
name: Sporish

description: Their spores are known to cause hallucinations. They are sometimes used by therapists in order to usher patients into expressing their problems.
name: Guspore

description: They use their strong back legs to leap at high altitudes. They use camouflage to blend in with the grass and avoid predators.
name: Camopper

description: This Pokémon flies at speeds of over 40 mph and skewers prey with its sharp beak. Tweetum love to hum and sing and always travel looking for others, people and Pokémon alike, to serenade.
name: Tweetum

description: This Pokémon can fly as fast as a jet. Its extremely sharp beak can reduce a boulder to gravel with just three pecks.
name: Dartum

description: This Pokémon's beak can skewer straight through a boulder. It flies at Mach II speeds and pierces prey and enemies with its beak.
name: Hummidar

description: It loves to drink blood. It latches onto unsuspecting people and Pokémon and drain them of their bodily fluids.
name: Bloatea

description: Its body stays encased in a clear shell as it awaits evolution. It is still capable of attacking despite being in its shell.
name: Damsegg

description: After evolving from its shell, its body had more room to develop fully. Its feathery tail acts as a sensor, alerting it if danger is near.
name: Lamsil

description: Selefly and Odonyxpa often get into fights over food, as they both target Feemosk on a daily basis. It is said to have a connection to outer space due to the patterns on its wings.
name: Selefly

description: These Pokémon are said to be the spirits of kids who died by drowning. It pretends to be in danger by flailing in water. Once someone is close, it drags them down deep into the water, never to be seen again.
name: Foobay

description: Groups of them inhabit ponds and lakes and skate across the surface. They can reach speeds of over 40 mph while on water, but are unusually slow on land.
name: Stiltream

description: Using their long legs, they glide elegantly across the surface of water with ease. There are often competitions between Skiisect to see which of them is able to ski across a body of water the quickest and smoothest.
name: Skiisect

description: This Pokémon's drool is full of vitamins and nutrients that are able to heal any injury. It constantly drools on itself in order to keep its wool healthy.
name: Alpacott

description: Alpaking have rather arrogant tendencies; Sylvungra are their main rivals. If they have too much fluid stored in their bodies, they drool profusely; this causes them to become very embarrassed.
name: Alpaking

description: Storing electricity in its legs allows it to jump 20 feet in the air. With their pronged tails, they drain electricity from outlets to store in their cheek pouches.
name: Jerblitz

description: This Pokémon's yawn can cause anyone in a city to fall asleep simultaneously. Its mouth has special glands inside of it that amplifies its yawn.
name: Echawn

description: This Pokémon can amplify its yawn across a 500 meter radius. Simply looking at this Pokémon for too long could cause disorientation and a feeling of drowsiness.
name: Zeeyawn

description: This Pokémon has an extreme obsession with coins. Its tail acts like a bag, allowing it to store all of the items it takes.
name: Crookoin

description: This Pokémon is mostly active during nighttime. It breaks into people's home silently and steal all of their coins without making a single sound.
name: Raccoin

description: It breaks into banks and houses, stealing every coin that they see silently. It orders Crookoin and Raccoin to steal from the innocent and bring the valuables to it when it is tired.
name: Thievoin

description: It burrows underground in order to shield itself from harsh sunlight. Its lower body is encased in soil, but it is still able to move above the ground by hopping on its single white foot.
name: Wormound

description: Their hard, durable bodies are covered in a metal alloy that can deflect any attack that doesn't effect it. They drill tunnels for hours on end to entertain themselves and make their own homes.
name: Drillurm

description: They use their fins to help them swim faster underwater. They are able to inhale and extract salt from water using their big nose.
name: Babara

description: Their fins allow them to swim at unimaginable speeds. They use their tooth to crack open nuts and eat them.
name: Baraqua

description: For some odd reason, this Pokémon are hatched from nuts as opposed to eggs. Because their wings are merged with the nut they were hatched from, and they are not strong enough to fully break out of their shell, they keep them on for protection.
name: Nutchir

description: It is able to retreat into its nut shell to defend itself and also camouflage itself. Its body parts have been freed, allowing it to fly and walk better.
name: Wingorn

description: Staring into its eyes is said to put you in a trance. During thunderstorms, it follows humans that are wandering in the mountains and once asleep, they steal the electrons from their body.
name: Leerup

description: Its eyes are said to be able to control anyone who looks into them. Their howls can summon thunderstorms.
name: Howlurk

description: Born from smoke, this Pokémon enjoys being around fires. Their smoky bodies are so thick that they are able to knock out a Yongoro in a single hit.
name: Smokauf

description: They use their arms to punch bricks and concrete. Their bodies are comprised of a potent gas that can kill anyone just by having them inhale it.
name: Kaufite

description: Its tongue is covered in over 100 potent toxins. If a Nibbid bites you, you have 24 hours to get healed or its poison will kill you.
name: Nibbid

description: One lick from it is the equivalent to 1,000 doses of Princada venom. Its poison is toxic enough to melt the skin off of a human in two minutes.
name: Chomodo

description: Its poisonous jaws are able to melt through metal and bones. Its markings are warning signs to everything that approaches it.
name: Toxila

description: They run across the branches of trees with great speed and agility. It has a rivalry with Eftini over territory.
name: Liskid

description: The black leaves on its body contain a potent mold that can infect other plants, making them inedible. Lisking and Tefrin are related species.
name: Lisking

description: Using its drill-like tail, it burrows underground for shelter. If spotted, they bury themselves in sand to remain unnoticed.
name: Dryvern

description: By spinning its body at high speeds, it can burrow underground. They are one of the main reasons that there are holes in the desert.
name: Wyvast

description: Its wings are full of sand. When it feels threatened, they dispel an extreme amount to disguise itself and escape. They spend majority of their time underground, so they have no real urge to eat anything; they only eat when food comes close to them.
name: Vyrnound

description: Jarotion once lived alongside humans, having the unique ability to transform stones into delicious beverages. They thrive by drinking mud and water inside of damp caves.
name: Jarotion

description: They stand motionless in caves, observing everything that happens inside. They are mostly nocturnal and will travel at night in order to eat cold sand.
name: Stalloway

description: They hang from cave ceilings, blending in with their environment to avoid detection. Lagmine maintain a steady diet gravel and rock in order to keep their rocky shells strong.
name: Lagmine

description: Their noses all have an internal pouch under their nasal cavities that allow them to breathe and absorb water through their nostrils simultaneously. They like to jump into water and splash those around them.
name: Hiplash

description: They jump into water from a great height, creating a massive wave that soaks everything around it. They blast high pressured water from their nasal cavities.
name: Hiphoon

description: It is said to have existed 20,000 years ago. Their spikes were once used for weapons, as they could never shatter or bend.
name: Spinorus

description: It is able to fire its spikes at high speeds and they always instantly grow back. Their bodies are covered in piercing sharp spikes.
name: Kentrike

description: The fins on its head and back helps it sense ocean currents over 30,000 years ago. Their fins gave them a scary illusion of it being a dangerous creature.
name: Dimeno

description: Said to have lived over 30,000 years ago, this Pokémon relied on its fins for survival. It blends into water in order to catch prey.
name: Dimoiston

description: The coin on its back is extremely valuable, as it is said to give its owner strange and otherworldly power. It was highly worshiped by Egyptians.
name: Scarabea

description: These Pokémon carry treasures inside of their bodies that are extremely valuable. The coins on its body are able to be launched like bullets.
name: Beatroph

description: It runs across the desert roads so fast that you can't see it. It neglects using its wings due to the fact that its legs are more powerful.
name: Dirrun

description: You rarely ever see these "Desert Blurs" because they run so fast that you only see dust. They can cause sand whirls by continuously running in a circle.
name: Blurrun

description: These Pokémon live in mountains and hate travelers who invade their territory. They are very vicious towards other Lynobca that they encounter, especially if there is food involved.
name: Lynobca

description: These Pokémon live in the desert and use their feathery crests to find prey. If they find suitable prey, they inject them with a paralyzing poison, and bury them in the sand, waiting for them to die.
name: Princada

description: This devious Pokémon uses its body to hypnotize prey; while hypnotized, the victim will feel no pain as Kinang eats it alive. It buries whatever is left in the ground and comes back for it the next day.
name: Kinang

description: They are said to have come to Earth from an asteroid. Their crescent markings glow brightly when in danger.
name: Bunnoon

description: Its body's unable to withstand even a gentle punch. It swims at high speeds underwater and eats the kelp and algae that grows on the bottom.
name: Shrimpy

description: It travels in groups in order to defend itself better because of its weak exterior. Its sharp claws and frills make it a force to be reckoned with.
name: Prawnip

description: It lives underwater, using the water currents to move it from place to place Moving past each other often causes them to get tangled up.
name: Kelgae

description: It drifts along ocean currents, winding up in strange locations. It is so agile that it can swim across an entire lake in less than a minute.
name: Kelphlow

description: The band around its body allows the water inside of it to move freely. If its band is removed, it goes back to being a regular sphere.
name: Osmomso

description: The bands on its body allow liquid to flow into each section, forming its appendages. The liquid that makes up its body is closely related to water, but scientists have yet to prove what it is.
name: Difflow

description: Its bands block the fluid flowing throughout its body, forming its muscles. It is able to move using its huge arms instead of using its petite legs.
name: Osmodon

description: Its feathers are often used as an alternate light source, replacing lanterns and light bulbs. The water that they produce has an effect that causes your body to glow for a limited amount of time.
name: Azuron

description: Their jaws are strong enough to chew through metal. Their shells are made of solidified sand and dirt that is extremely hard to break.
name: Chompurt

description: Their shells are comprised of a strong metal that can't be dented or melted. Their powerful jaws are strong enough to rip cars apart.
name: Jawtle

description: Its body sweats out spicy juices when it is tired. Its flames are extremely hot and are often used to help cook spicy foods.
name: Peppaur

description: Its bodily fluids can be harvested, heated, hardened and ground into fine spices. It often hunts Warmild and Fuegold for food.
name: Jalausaur

description: It has the ability to melt into water, as well as vanish into thin air. They enjoy swimming and get startled very easily.
name: Stripeleon

description: This Pokémon is admired because of its adorable appearance and cheery personality. The peppermint on top of its head is very sweet and can be used as a medicine.
name: Mintot

description: The peppermints they produce are considered to be better than ones manufactured. They attack on Mintril's command.
name: Marqint

description: They use their indestructible peppermint canes as weapons against foes. Its cries make Mintot and Marqint follow their every command.
name: Mintril

description: They are often seen during stormy days, devouring and absorbing other clouds to add to its body. It can cause terrible cyclones by blowing out large volumes of air.
name: Cumulite

description: They skewer berries with their fork-like tail and roast them on their backs before eating them. Their main prey consists of Scarabea, Wormound, and Prosuture, but they often resort to dirt or berries if none are around.
name: Vaarkin

description: By dancing, it can summon rain clouds that drench the surrounding area. The water it produces is said to be full of nutrients that strengthen the mind and body.
name: Droprin

description: The raindrops on their heads act as helmets, deflecting every attack that comes toward them. They can summon and control storm clouds with their fingers.
name: Donpour

description: Wastox is the outcome of a experiment gone horribly wrong in which a group of scientists attempted to artificially create a new, radioactive mineral. Prolonged exposure to this Pokémon can cause terminal illnesses.
name: Wastox

description: These playful Pokémon love using their paws to shock people. They are able to absorb electricity through the horns on their heads.
name: Zapour

description: They hide in water, waiting for others to unknowingly approach it; once they are close, they shock them. Absorbing electricity through its horns, it is able to discharge more than 450,000 volts of electricity.
name: Xolect

description: By rubbing its hands together quickly, it can produce thick smokescreens that allow it to escape. The pattern on its belly heats up when it eager for a battle.
name: Sweltoad

description: It incinerates trees and fallen logs in order to eat the ashes that are left behind. It can create flamethrowers with its hands by snapping its fingers and blowing out a flammable gas.
name: Toadaze

description: By blowing out air from the holes in their beaks, they can create a plethora of different sounds. Their green feathers allow them to blend in well with the leaves of trees.
name: Toucaw

description: In a flock, the one with the brightest crest is considered the leader. Despite its size, its beak is weak and extremely sensitive. This makes its beak a weak point in battle, but it also allows it to detect incoming danger.
name: Macawlur

description: They wander around forests and marshes, causing sadness all around; their mere presence causes flowers to droop. It is said that if you look into its eyes, you will be cursed with eternal sorrow.
name: Grovaunt

description: Its honey is extremely sticky and hard to get out of. It dangles from tree branches, drooling the sweet nectar on the ground in order to attract prey.
name: Honicras

description: Their two heads are always oozing sweet honey from their maws, making it easy to lure small insects to them. They are often attacked by groups of Honoger, who want nothing more than to eat their entire, honey-soaked bodies.
name: Drooluny

description: They gallop in silence, catching friends and foes off-guard with their sudden appearances. It is thought that the chains around its legs restrict its power and keep its malicious urges in check.
name: Coltergeist

description: It is imperative that you keep an eye on it at all times; stories of it devouring trainers have been told for centuries. It absorbs the spirits of those that cross it, storing them its is bright mane.
name: Phanteke

description: Avoid staring at its face, as your facial features will start to slowly disappear if you linger too long. The special leaf on its face allows it to both shapeshift into and possess humans in order to get high-quality food for itself.
name: Maskoon

description: This Pokémon was said to have been born from the spirits of those who died by fire. They silently absorb the spirits of sleeping children at night, making their flames glow brighter.
name: Wispur

description: The heat of its flame has caused its jar to crack and expand, allowing the fire to escape. It is able to burn an entire body to pieces while also stealing the soul of the person it kills.
name: Wisphlare

description: Because it was confined so long inside of it, its body is unable to leave through the opening. Its six flaming arms can absorb a human's body and burn them from the inside out, feeding on its soul's pain and agony...
name: Flarispur

description: It came to life from a fortune teller's old rag doll. It lurks in haunted houses and is the cause of the weird occurrences that effect any, if not all, household objects.
name: Ecalpsim

description: Groups of them are known to take down large prey and devour them while they are still alive. Their razor sharp teeth and claws can cut through bones like butter. Very voracious, they are able to eat up to double their body weight in food at any given time. This comes at a cost, as this leaves them very sluggish and unable to fully defend themselves.
name: Shreverine

description: With its razor sharp claws and teeth, it tears its prey to shreds. It has been observed taking down Frigiox and Yaking with minimum effort. They are extremely stubborn, never backing down from a fight, no matter the size of the opponent. Even if its back is against the wall, it will keep fighting until it can no longer move.
name: Wolvered

description: These Pokémon float around ancient ruins, pretending to be rare artifacts. Grave robbers find these Pokémon, expecting them to be artifacts, but they are actually living beings.
name: Glystone

description: These Pokémon use their antennae on their faces to sense their surroundings. The number of cracks on their body determines how old they are.
name: Stonivate

description: These Pokémon gather in groups during full moons and absorb energy in their antennae. When angered, their antennae glow and they fling people into the air as if they're weightless.
name: Gravonevis

description: These Pokémon cannot see, so they use the sensor on their heads to navigate. They ram into opponents with great force, knocking the wind out of them.
name: Tyram

description: They have been known to devour boulders and mountains when they are hungry. With their mighty jaws, they can snap a semi in half. Their eyesight is very poor, so they rely on their sense of smell in order to track their prey. They will eat anything that they manage to find.
name: Tantyra

description: Acored came to be when an old acorn absorbed the light of the moon. Its entire body is hollow; it is said that if you stare into an Acored's body, your spirit vanishes forever.
name: Acored

description: Hollark are said to be old trees possessed by wayward spirits. They stand motionless in forests waiting for others to walk by before grabbing them and draining them of their life energy.
name: Hollark

description: Pupreez entertain themselves by wresting in the snow. By freezing moisture in the air around it, it is able to pronounce snow for a short while.
name: Pupreez

description: Its howl can send chills down the spines of the innocent. A group of them can cause an avalanche just by howling at the same time.
name: Wulfreeze

description: Packs of them are known to destroy villages and devour everything in sight. Their howls can create blizzards and hailstorms that last for 2 whole months.
name: Snokami

description: Its large hump on its back is actually a cloak it is born with. Calfrid is able to shed its cloak in favor of a new one, which is then able to be worn by humans.
name: Calfrid

description: This Pokémon is known for helping people stuck in mountains and avalanches. They tread in snowy mountains, looking for adequate places to create burrows for smaller Pokémon that get stranded or lost.
name: Frigiox

description: It wanders the snowy mountains looking for others to play with. When it sees other Pokémon or humans, it excitedly approaches them, but it ends up looking threatening. This causes others to flee from it, making it sadder.
name: Loneti

description: It has a very abrasive and independent personality. It will always avoid contact with other humans and Pokémon.
name: Brawleti

description: It is very sluggish, making it easy prey for bird Pokémon; it spits out a beam of ice in order to protect itself. When it sleeps, it creates a small icy dome for protection.
name: Grubrr

description: It hangs in icy caves and mountains like an icicle as it awaits evolution, and once that time is near, it falls. The inside of its body is very cold and rocky.
name: Cryoon

description: By flapping its icy wings, it can create a snowstorm in a matter of seconds. They are said to be the reincarnations of ancient ice gods who died while trying to save their people.
name: Himalayoth

description: They bury themselves in the ground, using their snowman-like plant, in order to evade capture. When they sense a human's presence, they will follow them, making them extremely uncomfortable until they leave the area.
name: Snoseed

description: The sharp blade at the end of its tail is actually a bone. It uses this blade to slice prey apart. It is mostly active at night. They will sneak into the homes of other Pokémon while they are sleeping and steal their rations.
name: Weashar

description: It is thought that their appearance is a sign of bad things to come. They are often found lurking around cemeteries. With its sharp blades, it can slice an entire pickup truck in half. It moves swiftly and silently, making people believe that it was a ghost.
name: Bladinski

description: When they swim, their fins remain above water, giving them the appearance of a larger creature. They are often depicted in children's books as kindhearted water spirits.
name: Rivard

description: It slithers through the sea looking for prey. Its slim body allows it to slip through cracks in rocks and reefs.
name: Serpond
