description: Its noble, yet dangerous appearance make it an amazing sight to see. These Pokémon were once hated all around Xenioh because of the destruction they caused, but are now loved because of their chivalrous and graceful abilities.
name: Sergalak

description: This Pokémon roams around Power Plants, absorbing electricity through its thunderbolt-shaped arm. It loves short-circuiting electronic devices and scaring innocent people and Pokémon.
name: Shockris

description: It shoots through electronics and causes them to explode. They feed off of the screams and static from people they prank.
name: Glitzap

description: It is able to use its long thunderbolt shaped arm to travel inside power wires and short them out, causing blackouts. It enjoys pulling pranks on people and Pokémon.
name: Zapris

description: These Pokémon are often seen during funerals, letting out horrifying shrieks in order to scare those in attendance. Shrievil reside around cemeteries, absorbing wandering spirits into their bodies while singing happily.
name: Shrievil

description: They love sneaking behind people and Pokémon and making loud noises to startle them. There was one case where a Demariek was blamed for the demise of an elderly woman.
name: Demariek

description: They spin opposite of each other in order to generate electricity. They are able to function individually if they generate enough power in their bodies.
name: Duorb

description: Its 'arms' are actually separate heads that each have their own brain and personality. It generates electricity by rotating the heads against its body.
name: Matonic

description: Its three heads use electromagnetic signals to communicate with each other. Its lower half spins at over 60 mph in order to generate over 1,000 megavolts of electricity.
name: Autogenate

description: It can generate electricity by spinning its tail around. They are able to communicate by touching the tips of their tails together, causing an array of buzzing sounds.
name: Monkurren

description: A special organ located around its rear allows it to absorb large amounts of electricity at a single time. Electricity crackles through their fur when they're angry.
name: Monkilo

description: By rapidly banging its chest, it generates vast amounts of electricity. When it gets excited, it emits powerful sparks from its body that can rip the bark off of trees.
name: Gorillect

description: Huntear are remarkably resilient and persistent. When it begins chasing you, there is no chance of escaping. Its darker fur allows it to blend in with the forest surroundings. It uses its powerful jaws to tear prey apart.
name: Huntear

description: They walk on the water's surface as if they are looking for something. Their green eyes are said to project images that only it can see.
name: Aqusus

description: They run on the water's surface at high speeds and disappear from view. It is believed that they travel to an alternate dimension when they disappear.
name: Susparill

description: Their flames can reach temperatures of up to 100,000 degrees Fahrenheit. They were worshiped as deities in ancient times for their ability to devour metals and create new ones.
name: Metaurost

description: If you step on one of its spikes, a burning sensation courses through your body. This Pokémon's spikes are very hot despite it living underwater.
name: Hurchin

description: If you were to step on one of these Pokémon's spikes, your foot would melt from the inside out. When flames erupt from the ends of their spikes underwater, it means that they are about to explode.
name: Urchar

description: They lie at the bottom of the ocean with their sharp, poison-filled tail hung out in the open in order to lure prey. When prey is near, it jabs it with its tail, delivering poison and electricity into its system.
name: Electray

description: These Pokémon live under the sea and use the pores on their bodies to absorb freshwater in order to gain nutrients. Their bodies are torn easily, but they regenerate quickly.
name: Absorage

description: These Pokémon's pores are powerful enough to absorb anything into its body. Its body is comparable to a black hole, as few things that go in hardly ever come back out.
name: Sorbunge

description: They use their sharp, elongated canine to pierce berries for their juice. They can run across any surface, water or land, because their hooves are fully insulated.
name: Reefawn

description: They are highly aggressive and will often attack each other with their icy horns to assert dominance. They roam in Arctic areas, using their teeth and antlers to skewer berries.
name: Frigeer

description: They often test each other's strength by ramming into each other with their icy horns. To assert dominance, they charge at weaker members of their herd.
name: Staglacie

description: They are extremely clumsy and slow because of their large tusk. They usually have to crawl on all fours in order to keep balance across slippery surfaces.
name: Tuskria

description: These Pokémon often beach themselves in order to play with children. They are nicknamed "Balloons of the Sea" because of their cute, chubby appearances and the way their tails' ribbon-like ends sway while they swim.
name: Teenee

description: It floats across the surface of water for fun. It can twirl its tail's ends like a propeller in order to move quickly underwater.
name: Ballatee

description: By boiling water inside of its body, it is able to produce enough pressurized steam to fly. They ingest large amounts of water through their gills and burn it all inside to let it speed up while swimming.
name: Salift

description: They shoot out of water like rockets. Many of them have been discovered flying in outer space because their great speed and velocity.
name: Shiphlon

description: This Pokémon pretends to be an ancient artifact in order to lure grave robbers; once they pick it up, the markings on its body glow and the person is cursed forever. The markings are different on each one; it is said that the markings are actually words that can release an evil spirit unto the world if it is read correctly.
name: Tabex

description: Their wings don't allow flight, so their bodies enable them to levitate subconsciously. They take pleasure in destroying the homes of smaller Pokémon.
name: Amphlight

description: These Pokémon roam the skies, destroying everything in its path. It has a sadistic personality and will always watch its prey suffer before devouring it.
name: Phiteragon

description: Their skin is as rough as sandpaper. They have 50 razor sharp teeth that are considered extremely valuable by islanders.
name: Jawark

description: Scraping against these Pokémon causes you to lose skin. Despite only four being seen, they have over 100 teeth in their maws that are able to crush anything from concrete to tempered steel.
name: Pierciark

description: They have over 300 teeth that are powerful enough to crush a semi. Their extremely rough skin is able to rip skin from bone.
name: Maliciark

description: It uses the floating orbs around it to amplify its Psychic-type power. Its body is as hard as diamond and can't be scratched.
name: Orbro

description: These Pokémon can frighten its opponents because if both heads are aligned, they can give the appearance of being eyeballs with arms. This Pokémon is formed when one of Orbro's floating orbs attaches itself to its tail.
name: Doublorb

description: This Pokémon is formed when the orbs floating in the palms of Doublorb attach to them. They are able to blast beams from each eye and the opening between them.
name: Quadross

description: They spend most of their time running into trees and tearing them down to eat their leaves and fruit. These Pokémon often travel in large groups.
name: Hournbyl

description: They reside in mountainous areas, heating up their surroundings with their high temperature flames. Kindlyth are said to be stone statues that were mysteriously brought to life. Whether this is true or not is still up for debate...
name: Kindlyth

description: They are extremely aggressive, attacking anything that they see moving with flames of up to 15,000 degrees F. Each head has a brain and a different personality, but they all act the same way, regardless.
name: Cerberok

description: These Pokémon enjoy biting their own tails because the sweet tasting nectar in the end of it strengthens their Psychic-type moves. They spend hours on end playfully chasing and gnawing on their tails.
name: Omnomon

description: By gnawing on its long tail, it increases its mental power. It can use its tail as a shield from dangerous attacks and it will not have any effect.
name: Nomogon

description: It is able to clamp down on its tail and continuously gnaw on it while it is battling. The nectar at the end of its tail is far more concentrated, making its Psychic-type moves even stronger.
name: Munchanon

description: Said to be a ruler of the night, it is thought that its cry can cause day to immediately turn to night. For a long time, it was thought to be nothing more than a myth, as its body blends in with the night sky.
name: Tezcapanas

description: A legendary bird of Xenioh folklore, it is said to appear during intense battles and wars. It is known to cause chaos every so often and will spectate its work from a distance.
name: Dattapoch

description: Legends of it roaming the plains of Xenioh have existed for centuries. Its intense flames glow as bright as the sun.
name: Taikin

description: It is said that it can cause torrential downpours when it howls. Tales of it swimming all over the world have been told for centuries.
name: Kamikazin

description: Although they are related, Lunaporin has never been mentioned alongside Taikin nor Kamikazin in any legends. It is thought to be due to very few sightings or encounters, leading to it fading into obscurity. It lets out a a spine-chilling howl when the moon is at its highest point in the sky.
name: Lunaporin

description: This legendary bird of Xenioh lore was said to have the ability to make crops grow by shedding its feathers over fields. There is an old myth that states that peering into its eyes will remove all of the toxins from your body.
name: Xipenagor

description: Known as the Lord of Purity in mythology, it embodies positivity, kindness, and innocence. The winner of continuous feuds with Tawartagun, it ensures that the region remains stable.
name: Fasutagon

description: An embodiment of malice and hate, it sleeps within a shard, only being awakened when its rage boils over. In mythology, it is known as the Dark Lord. It battled against Fasutagon and lost, but repeatedly seeks vengeance.
name: Tawartagun

description: Mercotical is thought to have the ability to control all living plants, as well as bring deceased plants back to life. Being in possession of one of its many leaf-like feathers is said to give one the ability to communicate with Grass-type Pokémon with ease.
name: Mercotical

description: They swing from branches and vines using their long tails. Their movements are so swift and graceful that they are nicknamed "The Grove Gymnasts."
name: Limbetaur

description: The seed in its tail has sprouted, giving it more agility. Its tail allows it to swing from tree branches, before it lets go and takes off with its larger wings.
name: Taurgile

description: The flower at the end of its tail gives off wind that allows it to move quicker and precisely. Its fluent motions and agility as it leaps from branches cannot be matched by any other Pokémon.
name: Brevithe

description: The stripe on their heads glow when they use Fire-type moves. Their wings allow it to fly short distances, allowing them to attack from above.
name: Jersinge

description: It loves to laugh at the misery of others. It is said that their flames can never be extinguished and will burn hotter and hotter.
name: Bursinge

description: According to folklore, if a person dies, an Arsonite will burn the body, but leave the soul for its consumption. It loves the screams of agony it causes when it burns a human, knowing that its flames' burn will never go away.
name: Arsonite

description: They spend most of their time playing in or near the water. Their furry tails are said to be a symbol of peace and if they are droopy or oily, it is a sign that Quendro has been injured.
name: Quendro

description: It loves laying at the bottom of the sea, viewing all battles from the dark crevices it calls home. Using its crest and whiskers, it is able to read water currents and know when the water has been tainted.
name: Draquatik

description: Its whiskers and fins are able to detect when a tsunami or massive rainstorm is about to occur. It is highly recognized for helping civilians that are plagued by said disasters.
name: Turategon

description: A very agile Pokémon, Martemid is able to run extremely quick in order to escape its enemies. If approached, they will shake erratically out of fright and release heat.
name: Martemid

description: Martal's hands are able to be set ablaze to help it in battles. It hates intimidation and will always lunge at enemies that anger it.
name: Martal

description: These Pokémon are able to create minuscule earthquakes by laying on their backs and spinning rapidly. They travel in groups and the one with the biggest crest is the leader.
name: Erthaur

description: They cause massive earthquakes by driving their legs into the ground and vibrating them. They live buried deep underground.
name: Terraur

description: The flames that erupt from Flammapple's body resemble leaves, fooling many people who encounter them. Their bodies are hollow, but can still pack an explosive charge when these Pokémon are startled.
name: Flammapple

description: Its able to envelop its body in its green flame if humans get too close. The fuzz on its body can get stuck to your body and will cause a burning sensation on the skin within twenty minutes.
name: Peachar

description: It explodes when it is frightened. Pokémon and humans who attempt to eat it end up getting a very unpleasant surprise.
name: Pyrear

description: Hissano use their rattles at the end of their tails to communicate with each other. They mainly feast on leaves, but love to eat rodents on occasion.
name: Hissano

description: This peculiar Pokémon's appearance has puzzled scientists for centuries. It hangs from trees and closes its actual eyes, which are on its bottom half, making it appear as a doll as it awaits evolution.
name: Disgoon

description: It uses its collar as wings to fly around. When not in flight, it folds its wings and lies in bushes to avoid being bothered.
name: Hebirash

description: These Pokémon are born on the sticks they float on. Their yellow eyes are said to enable them to sense anything that will happen in the past, present, or future as well as give them mystical powers.
name: Tarespo

description: Their eyes are more powerful, and allow them to see into anybody's past or future. According to old folktales, an Espowtar is able to destroy a person's past, causing them to vanish into thin air.
name: Espowtar

description: The hue of their feathers vary depending on their location. The beautiful feathers they shed can be collected and used for many articles of clothing.
name: Ruffeatz

description: It has been discovered that there are over thirty known feather color patterns for Quetzuff. When their feathery "hoods" start molting, it is sign that they are about to evolve.
name: Quetzuff

description: As it matures, its hood-like feathers molt and turn a darker color. Male Fethetz have longer tail feathers, which they use to perform dances to attract females.
name: Fethetz

description: It is able to give off a multitude of odors that can either be pleasant or repugnant. They stand on their arms and spray the air with a sweet odor when they are happy.
name: Fragras

description: It has a fairly arrogant attitude and will not listen to its trainer unless it accepts its stench. Their waste generally smells nice, so it is often collected and transformed into some of the best perfume.
name: Aromunk

description: Vauveau never lets go of the ring it carries. It loves suckling on rings because it enjoys the metallic taste.
name: Vauveau

description: It loves to use the rings that it collects as toys. If it loses its ring, it grows very depressed.
name: Veaula

description: Its genetic structure has been influenced by scientists, allowing it to evolve into three different forms. They seem to enjoy being outside during nights when showers and thunderstorms are prevalent.
name: Skweek

description: They store food inside of their pouches, which give them large amounts of energy. Their ends of their tails can produce up to 10,000 volts of electricity.
name: Ikarode

description: It is able to create over 9,000,000 kilowatts of electricity with its tail. They throw orbs of electricity from their pouches that can reduce a tank to ashes.
name: Livolt

description: It has often been discovered living in the attics and basements of old homes. Some stories have claimed that this Pokémon was the personification of wickedness.
name: Evyl

description: They enjoy being around malicious people and those who are full of rage. It thrives off of that energy. According to old tales, those who have encountered it are said to be sent to an eternal abyss of pain and agony. Luckily, there has been no evidence of this being true.
name: Vylent

description: It is often seen as a role model to younger Water-Pokémon due to its calm and confident nature. Maroden often live isolated lives near beaches and lakes; they protect themselves by producing a thick foam from their arms and ears.
name: Maroden

description: They are able to create giant waves by slamming water with its large tail. Known as a calm and admirable leader, these Pokémon mentor others in order for them to show their true strength.
name: Seltzea

description: It is covered it a slimy film that lets attacks slide off of it. It covers itself with banana peels in order to hide from predators.
name: Bananug

description: When it is asleep, it goes into its banana peel and cloaks itself, making it look like the normal fruit. They sometimes hang from trees until their peels are ripened and they fall off.
name: Slugana

description: It loves letting the wind blow it around. It is a very docile and gentle Pokémon that loves to be around humans.
name: Dandeseed

description: It scatters its fluff around fields in order for more Dandeseed to be born. It acts as a parent among a group.
name: Fluffelion

description: Buddee wraps its vine around people and Pokémon that they like. They are vastly known for the butter they secrete from their mouth.
name: Buddee

description: It leaks butter from its flower when it is happy and when it makes new friends. It is said that if you taste its butter, you will be granted with eternal happiness.
name: Buddelf

description: Once you taste the butter it gives off, you will be blessed with eternal joy. They love to help others who need happiness.
name: Budderor

description: In order to protect themselves, they roll into hard balls. This allows them to blend in with rocky environments, while also giving them a way to escape from danger. Their shells are mostly made of solidified mud, so it makes sure to keep itself dry at all times.
name: Dillar

description: The hair covering their shells are extremely sensitive, so it cries out when it is touched by others. Their shells used to be used to create musical instruments for years before being deemed too inappropriate.
name: Armadril

description: Their shells are extremely durable, despite being comprised of mostly mud. Not even a Hydro Pump can penetrate them. Their tails are powerful enough to topple a tree in one swing.
name: Armordilo

description: It hides in gardens, disguised as a plant. It eats a lot of soil to aid in its growth; soil provides it with most of its energy.
name: Mantor

description: They stand still in large flower patches, blending in so that they can stay hidden. They can make their leafy claws sharp enough to slash though tempered steel.
name: Orchin

description: They bury themselves in the ground, disguised as everyday shrubs. They have a tendency to rest on people's heads because they enjoy the feeling of hair and stubble.
name: Pastrub

description: It stands still with its head and claws tucked into its bushy back, disguising itself as a normal bush. They sometimes use their claws to mow long grass for berries.
name: Krabbush

description: Beloved by women, these little Pokémon are sometimes seen riding in purses. They love eating bitter berries and playing in wide open fields.
name: Jouby

description: These Pokémon only eat berries that it deem worthy to be eaten. It uses Jouby to complete tasks for itself such as bathing, feeding, and grooming.
name: Jougrou

description: These Pokémon keep themselves buried, using their flower-like tails to absorb sunlight that they can convert to electricity. Nezumika stores electricity in its cheeks and send it into its paws, but because its power is so weak, it only gives an enemy a tingling sensation.
name: Nezumika

description: Its ears are able to absorb air and sound waves in order to charge its tail, which acts as a radar and sonar. It hides in the darkness of caves.
name: Darbat

description: They use sonar to make their way around. Highly territorial, it uses its tail to communicate to all invaders, effectively scaring them out of the territory.
name: Nyctinar

description: Hemoglee hides in water, waiting for unsuspecting people and Pokémon to enter in order to latch onto them. The red coloring of its underbelly is actually the blood from its victims.
name: Hemoglee

description: Suclot never stops drinking blood until its entire body is full. It swims quickly, using its spikes and coarse bristles to cut into victims and get more blood.
name: Suclot

description: According to legends, Molaby will appear when kids put teeth underneath their pillows. Its floss-like tail is able to cleanse anything it wraps around.
name: Molaby

description: Its floss-like tail tangles around its teeth-like legs constantly. They are very friendly, but will always try to take others' loose teeth without consent.
name: Cuspix

description: It has very large internal jaws full of teeth that it has collected. When they take teeth from children, they slowly swipe their floss across their mouth, causing the growth of new teeth faster.
name: Enamelle

description: These cute Pokémon run and play in forests. Their tails are naturally dormant and will ignite when they are excited or frightened.
name: Buranda

description: Their flames are often used to signal the beginning of major sporting events. When their tail flames peter out, they grow extremely sick and sluggish.
name: Ailite

description: It is said that their flames can melt the skin off of bone in an instant.
name: Blazesta

description: Beavah possibly has the lowest IQ of all Fighting-types. It is easy to distract and defeat in battle. They spend their time floating in water, staring at the sky. They can be attacked by anything, but will not register the pain until a bit later.
name: Beavah

description: The toothpick that it gnaws on acts as an anger suppressant. When it gets angry, it will start swinging its log around and biting everything around it. They are highly recognized for their innate abilities to create pieces of art by chewing on wood. A wooden statue created by a Nawurk was once sold for thousands.
name: Nawurk

description: Its bill is strong enough to pierce through bedrock. They fight each other, using their sword-like bills, in order to assert their dominance.
name: Marlord

description: This Pokémon is said to be the formation of ghastly spirits that try to destroy lives. It has a relatively jolly attitude and is very friendly toward all people and Pokémon.
name: Spookie

description: It inhabits abandoned buildings and haunted houses, living in the darkness. It passes through people's bodies and steals the plasma from their body.
name: Enemigma

description: It dwells in the darkness of underwater caverns, using its hook-like spine to lure prey towards it. Their bones are often collected and used to make strong hooks.
name: Baitrap

description: Transphin dwell in deep underwater caverns, feeding on Miniscale and Shrimpy. Their transparent skin and slow movements have earned them the nickname the 'Swimming Skeletons'.
name: Transphin

description: They extend their feelers to unimaginable lengths in order to inject their prey with a potent toxin. It sticks to the bottom of the sea, using their long, poisonous feelers to grab their prey.
name: Moneten

description: Its body is covered in hot quills that are able to release bursts of electricity. They shoot their quills at berries to roast them before eating them.
name: Kwillo

description: One stab from one of its quills can cause a burning pain that will last for weeks. Oddly enough, their quills are sometimes used by hairdressers to curl or straighten hair.
name: Spikwill

description: It stands on its tail whenever a full moon appears. They are known to get signals from the moon whenever their green eyes glow.
name: Insecrest

description: It clings to tree branches and absorbs moonlight through its horns. Its little legs don't allow it to walk correctly.
name: Crescoon

description: Its moon-shaped wings absorb moonlight in order to give it its power. It only appears on nights of crescent moons.
name: Lunoth

description: Accidentally stepping on this Pokémon triggers a special gland inside its body to spread a terrible odor to the surrounding area. Its diet consists mostly of rotten fruits.
name: Odoripe

description: This Pokémon is one to be reckoned with when its antenna is pulled. When threatened, it releases gases inside its body that causes its shell to expand and eventually explode, releasing the noxious gas.
name: Ripomb

description: Stenchar's tail is able to spray a repugnant odor that can curl noses from miles away. The button on its chest releases an odor from its head that acts as a knockout gas.
name: Stenchar

description: These Pokémon are known for gathering berries for people they befriend. Groups of them compete to see who can gather the most items.
name: Galagrow

description: These playful bird Pokémon love to battle and will playfully wrestle on the surface of water. They use their beaks to crack Mollusym shells for food.
name: Belkin

description: Their beautiful movements can put anyone in a trance. They dance on the surface of water, with the one in the center being the leader.
name: Ingorina

description: Years ago, these Pokémon were worshiped and loved by humans, but these days they are seen as a nuisance. As a result, they are often abandoned. They travel in large packs and typically avoid human contact.
name: Miningo

description: Very few humans are able to catch these Pokémon, and even if they are effectively captured, it ignores their trainers' orders. If it sees a human, it will immediately try to attack them due to its hatred of them.
name: Dingrowl

description: Its sack-like tail holds sand that can induce sleeping with one grain. Zable always feels tired, but its brain won't allow it to sleep.
name: Zable

description: Its tail, which usually holds a bunch of sand, can open and spill the sand out, but when it does, Dustzee can't help but lie on it. Its brain still won't allow it to sleep, so it is a tortuous act, as the sand is extremely comfortable.
name: Dustzee

description: Wallabound's feet pose a hindrance to it, as it always trips over them when walking, so it instead relies on bouncing on its tail to get around. Its large feet are strong enough to demolish solid concrete.
name: Wallabound

description: Their steel bodies are said to be unable to melt. These Pokémon are quick to start fights when they are bored.
name: Steleo

description: The metal inside of its mane helps it repel attacks that come towards its facial area. If these Pokémon are ever challenged, they will never back down, even if they are at a disadvantage.
name: Leobliter

description: The leaf on each of their tails can release intense light. They use their leaf frills to absorb sunlight in order to charge up and heal itself.
name: Leefril

description: Their frills absorb sunlight so quickly that they can initiate a Solar Beam attack immediately. They charge at anything that angers them.
name: Frilleave

description: They rub their hands together in order to generate electricity. Whenever it smacks something, the recipient receives a high voltage shock.
name: Slaplus

description: Its punches can disintegrate a small building. It absorbs electricity through its horns and spikes on its arms.
name: Puncharge

description: It gives the impression of having two heads when it is on all four of its legs. They poke and stab fruits, injecting them with poison as they eat it.
name: Sawee

description: Their claws release a potent toxin that can cause paralysis. They can rotate their claws in opposite directions like propeller blades.
name: Sharpod

description: They release a deadly poison that can kill in one minute. They fly in silence and strike when they feel threatened.
name: Knifly

description: It flies over gardens and fields, scattering spores from its wings to help the plants grow. They enjoy planting flowers and have a euphoric feeling after they bloom.
name: Terove

description: Their leafy wings contain spores that allow them to grow plants easily. They do not need to eat, and instead photosynthesize using their tails to create food for themselves.
name: Dactove

description: They guard fields and meadows, attacking anything that might damage the environment. Their wings turn a bright pink when they are healthy, and return to their green color when they're sick.
name: Meadactyl

description: These Pokémon race against each other to strengthen their limbs. They are really quick to run from trainers.
name: Fleetah

description: One of the fastest Pokémon ever, one was once recorded running at 175 mph! Its strong leg muscles allow it to run for hours on end without stopping.
name: Speedah

description: They are able to create bubbles thanks to a soapy secretion produced by their tails It tries very hard to be menacing and territorial, blasting bubbles at those who come too close, but its cute appearance makes it hard for it to be taken seriously.
name: Bubalo

description: Thought to have gone extinct, more were found living around a marsh over 500 years ago. Quick tempered, it will charge at any anyone and anything that approaches it, blasting jets of water from its horns.
name: Bufflow

description: This ancient Pokémon used horrific tactics to catch and devour its prey. It skewered its prey on its extendable horns and waited for them to stop moving before scraping them off and eating them savagely.
name: Stygilil

description: It rammed into prey and skewered them on its horns. If its prey was still alive after an attack, it would take pleasure in devouring it while it was still alive.
name: Styxol

description: It is thought to be the ancestor of all Fire-types. Its flames could melt the rocks of caves.
name: Pyrapt

description: It was the cause of many fires over 100 million years ago. It ran at a speed of 126 mph and slashed prey with its long nails.
name: Raptoast

description: Their jaws were strong enough to snap a semi-truck in half. Their spikes could quintuple in length and they would spin with their prey impaled on them to rip them into pieces.
name: Crocodon

description: They travel in groups and take multiple things from towns and buildings. They cause mischief wherever they go, but their cute appearance covers that fact.
name: Wotter

description: They watch over Wotter's heists and antics to make sure that all of them make it back. Using both of its eyes, it can't see that well, but when one of them is closed, they can see extremely well as if they are using binoculars.
name: Sailott

description: They command Wotter and Sailott to steal and bring back any valuable items, which it keeps in a special place. It uses its iron claws, which can switch paws at any time, to intimidate those it is stealing from.
name: Pirott

description: Its lower body isn't as developed as its upper body, so it has a diaper made of foam and bubbles to aid in its walking. When it is hurt, it absorbs water through its bubble diaper to heal itself.
name: Wataloo

description: It gives off a strange aura whenever it falls down. Despite its legs being fully developed, it still has trouble walking.
name: Manasea

description: Fully grown, it is able to to walk perfectly on all fours and on two legs. It is able to scale waterfalls and create giant holes in the sea using its magic orbs in order to catch prey.
name: Watullius

description: Kalique feign innocence to get on the good side of people, only to steal from them when left alone. They are said to be descendants of ancient gods, so they are often treated like royalty.
name: Kalique

description: Jakunn usually serve Kalique and Dibolika, doing whatever they tell them to do. They have been known to steal valuables from museums, stores, and homes in order to try and earn favor with their evolved forms.
name: Jakunn

description: Ancient texts described them as reincarnations of cruel deities. When in battle, it uses extremely underhanded tactics, going as far as to try to attack the opposing trainer so that they can't give their Pokémon any instructions.
name: Dibolika

description: It hates getting attention, as it makes them feel inferior, which is difficult for them because of their fur's lack of pigment. Nobody knows why, but it is born with gray fur, which turns white as it continues to grow.
name: Cerleu

description: If anyone makes eye contact with it, it goes into a blind rage. Its fur color makes it feel worthless, causing it become enraged because of its own insecurity.
name: Leucervid

description: These Pokémon came into existence when a rabbit died in a magician's hat during a magic act. It uses magical power in order to defend itself.
name: Hopo

description: These Pokémon came to life when young slaves possessed a scarecrow. It is said that they see their past lives through their blood red eye.
name: Cakaseed

description: After a farmer died in his barn, it was thought that this Pokémon was his reincarnation. It wanders fields and gardens, reliving every moment of his life by looking through its bloody eye.
name: Recrowile

description: These Pokémon have the agility and grace of a silent assassin. It never makes a sound when battling, making it able to defeat opponents quickly.
name: Assasect

description: They are commonly found in the mouths of Mollusym, eating bits of sand and algae that it swallows. Symbia and Mollusym have a symbiotic relationship. Mollusym provides Symbia with shelter and food, and Symbia protects Mollusym's valuable pearls.
name: Symbia

description: Inside of each of their mouths is a very valuable pearl, which the Symbia inside helps protects from intruders. They work in a symbiotic relationship, the Symbia gets a home and the Mollusym has protection.
name: Mollusym

description: By achieving enlightenment, this Pokémon's attack power increases tenfold. Its fluffy tail is made of mind fog, which allows it to read people's minds.
name: Monori

description: They float on their tails, which are composed of multiple stressful mists that it gives off as it meditates. The pearls around its neck helps it stay calm.
name: Psytori

description: They were born from the spirits of those killed on Halloween night. Each Halloween night, they roam cities looking for more victims in order to increase their species number.
name: Pumkid

description: It uses its three legs to stab trees and take their life force, making them die. Its creepy look and body gave it the nickname, The Grotesque Gourd.
name: Gourdaver

description: According to folklore, whenever the hands on its face strike midnight, a life is taken. It hangs on walls, pretending to be a clock, and frighten others that walk past it by rattling its pendulums.
name: Tiklok

description: As soon as it is born, it is able to run as fast as a jet. Their legs lack hooves, making them slightly defenseless, but the muscles inside make up for it.
name: Pontaur

description: Their hooves are strong enough to penetrate a Macernio's armor. They work in groups in order to protect Pontaur.
name: Taurough

description: The females of this species of Pokémon are known to be more attractive because of their fur, making them targets for hunters. The males will always try to protect the females from harm.
name: Penneswel

description: The males of this species are very defensive and protective, but can be known to have a sweet, mischievous side. The females use their beauty in order to manipulate the males into doing what they want.
name: Lagomelt

description: The females' fluffy fur is very durable and comfortable in order to protect their young. The males are extremely violent and will attack anyone who approaches its territory.
name: Harupt

description: It hides in the shadows and stalks wanderers at night, stealing their life force as it stares at them until they are unable to continue moving. It is said that if you stare at them for too long, you lose the ability to see clearly.
name: Scleros

description: Demeyes stalks wanderers at night, showing its bright eyes in order to steal their vision. There was an old wives' tale that said that Demeyes will steal the eyes of those who are malicious.
name: Demeyes

description: Googoust is the result of a malevolent spirit possessing the body of an infant. Extremely skittish, the spirit inhabiting Googoust's body comes out of its mouth and fights for both of them due to Googoust's inability to stand up for itself.
name: Googoust

description: It gives off a melodious sound when happy. Its voice is said to be the most beautiful out of all Pokémon in the Qiloh Region.
name: Tonex

description: Its "tail" is actually its intestines, which it uses to let out different tones for its melodious sounds. It eats kelp and plankton in order to keep its throat moist.
name: Xylotone

description: They are highly recognized as guide Pokémon because it is able to show people the errors that they make in the future. They can sense hostility and will match it by blasting beams from the mouth on its body.
name: Tikeye

description: They are said to read auras and bend ones mind to their will. They use their eyes to view into the past, present, and future.
name: Doseyedo

description: It is said to be the wisest Rock-type Pokémon. The multiple eyes on its body are the source of it massive power.
name: Pseye

description: Kuselass are said to be the spirits of female students that left this world via accidents. They target females and immediately attack them when they are the most vulnerable.
name: Kuselass

description: This Pokémon haunts sandy areas, floating in place and just staring at a victim, causing paranoia. It seems to have no emotions, as it shows no pain from attacks and it never seems to do anything but stare into space.
name: Yureibb

description: It occupies old hermit shells and only comes out when disturbed. Trainers who have this Pokémon are said to have no emotions later on.
name: Crustition

description: Their tails are encased in ice, allowing it to block attacks that hit it. They freeze particles in the air in order to create snow.
name: Cubite

description: They can breathe out snowflakes, making a fun time for children who encounter it. Their tails can fire snowballs and icicles as it swallows moisture in the air.
name: Rayookie

description: They were created when the moon's energy had an impact on an icicle. They keep their heads stuck in the roofs of icy caves in order to keep their bodies from melting.
name: Dimacrisal

description: Their bodies are covered in a sweet, powdery substance that attracts unwanted attention to it. It loves to dance and can always cheer someone up.
name: Tolum

description: Its body produces large amounts of sugar, which is often collected and used for pastries. At night, they gather in large groups and perform special dances that are said to bring joy and energy to those who see them.
name: Suitee

description: Its tail is small and stubby when it is first born, but it slowly grows as it ages. They swing their tails against cave walls in order to knock out stones to eat.
name: Maflano

description: Its body is comprised of an extremely strong metal that cannot be melted easily. Their tail is their most powerful weapon; one mighty swing from it could demolish a pickup truck.
name: Macernio

description: These Pokémon are independent and never want to be given much attention. Their snake-like tails can actually attack and bite anyone that comes to close to it, giving them a non-lethal dose of venom that causes headaches.
name: Cubera

description: Their claws are covered in a toxic film that allows them to poison any opponent. Their tails have a mind of their own and are very aggressive; they often bite Meravage's rears, making them angrier.
name: Meravage

description: They pretend to be asleep to give people and Pokémon a false sense of security as they move past, but their tails act as a second head and will inject them will a venom that causes instant paralysis. Their sharp teeth can shatter bones with just one crunch.
name: Chimeroar

description: They are extremely frightened of humans in the wild, but once captured, it bonds instantly. They never use their wings because they are scared of heights and as a result their wings are stiff.
name: Kibbelgo

description: When Kibbelgo evolves, it gains more confidence, but it also gains a cold personality. It doesn't care about the pain it causes or the condition its trainer or teammates are in; because of this, many trainers refuse to evolve Kibbelgo, causing a depletion in the species.
name: Drigano

description: It is said to have a special relationship with the Pokémon Virubic2. It assists scientists in labs, charging and powering their inventions.
name: Ionatt

description: They are very resilient and able to produce more than 50,000 gigawatts of electricity. It is often fired into outer space to help with extremely massive power outages.
name: Galvanatt

description: The flames they breathe are black and will destroy anything that it touches. Groups of them sometimes charge into small towns and burn everything around it.
name: Flamur

description: Their black flames can incinerate an entire forest in seconds. They always appear during times of strife to make everything worse.
name: Bealzuburn

description: Its dark flames incinerate anything they touch. It is widely feared because of its evil tendencies.
name: Oblimodor

description: Discovered in a cemetery, it is theorized that these Pokémon are the deformed skeletons of humans and Pokémon. Scientists have discovered that this Pokémon can survive even if it taken apart.
name: Spectrib

description: It is able to launch its body parts at enemies and immediately have it come back. The smoke around its body keeps it in check and without it, its body becomes nothing more than a pile of bones.
name: Ribone

description: It protects itself with an unused bomb shell. Because it resembles a toy, it is often taken and tossed around by children.
name: Bomini

description: They were discovered by scientists in a mechanical engineering factory. Their bodies are not well structured, but they are still able to fly perfectly by adjusting the weight of their underdeveloped arm and leg.
name: Sproket

description: Their bodies, now fully developed, allow it to travel at the speed of light. Its crest holds special coordinates that tell it where to go.
name: Litekore

description: They are said to produce vitamin-rich water that can heal minor injuries.  They are very playful and adventurous, interacting with the most dangerous Pokémon just for the fun of it.
name: Aquite ♀

description: They are known to cause mischief and trouble for fun. They hate being stopped by others, especially Oceogo.
name: Reille

description: They use their beauty and Fairy-type moves to keep Protecress in check. They do a lot of water-related pranks in cities while staying under the radar.
name: Damsoak

description: Despite its small size, it can fill an entire lake within a span of thirty minutes.  They are more responsible than Aquite ♀.
name: Aquite ♂

description: They enhance their strength by sitting underneath waterfalls. They are highly protective of anything that is rightfully theirs, as well as female Pokémon.
name: Oceogo

description: He tries his hardest to protect others from Damsoak's mischief, but he always ends up getting transfixed on her beauty. He concentrates and plans his own strategies in battle.
name: Protecress

description: Its warm, molted feathers are often made into beautiful clothing. They are able to fly, but only in short intervals. The thick feathers covering their body cushion their landing when they fall.
name: Hawte

description: As it flies, its fiery feathers sometimes fall out, but are immediately replaced by new ones. By flapping its wings, it can cause a minor heat wave in a matter of seconds.
name: Valiame

description: They are able to blind enemies by letting the electricity inside their connected body bounce around and escape. It is often targeted by poachers and jewel thieves.
name: Stwinkle

description: The green gem in the center is the main control unit of all of the other diamonds. They are able to blind their enemies by reflecting light in their direction.
name: Sparklug

description: Zashaunt are said to be the spirits of children who lived lavish lives; they are very friendly toward children. They are very mischievous, moving around the furniture and clothing in the homes in which they reside to frustrate the adults; despite their mischievous natures, they care about their homes and will watch out every night in order to ensure that no unwanted visitors intrude.
name: Zashaunt

description: They attack without mercy, biting and clawing at an attacker until they stop moving. They were known to guard castles in olden times.
name: Gurmrr

description: They are known to shred their prey into pieces. Their bodies are covered in a mixture of their own, as well as their victims', blood.
name: Chomutila

description: They freeze their fur, making it as sharp as needles, whenever they are touched by those they don't like. Their fur is usually a brownish-gray, but it turns white as it grows.
name: Coolyn

description: Their large paws act as snowshoes, making it so they don't sink or slip while walking across snowy areas. They are often used as guides to help people get across snowy areas.
name: Frosleet

description: Its sensitive paws are covered in thick hair, protecting them from the cold. Its natural enemy is Snokami.
name: Lynorth

description: Its arms are always extended in a zombie-like fashion. It always stares blankly from the tops of buildings, observing everything it sees.
name: Gargone

description: It perches itself atop buildings and treetops, watching whoever goes by. It occasionally goes by and attacks who it sees without a particular reason.
name: Gravoyle

description: They are extremely emotional and dislike when people argue. Their spikes can release a fluid that can heal wounds, making them sought by doctors and pharmacists.
name: Spyno

description: The orb on its chest can detect anger and spite, which makes it very upset. Its spikes can be used to calm and make hostile enemies friendly.
name: Dynospyke

description: Their discarded spikes are were once used to create medicines. Its diet consists mainly of leaves and branches; the more it eats, the stronger its Psychic abilities become.
name: Spykosor

description: They raise their tails during thunderstorms to charge themselves. They are very excitable and playful Pokémon that need to keep moving in order to keep up their energy.
name: Raiote

description: It is hypothesized that when they reach a certain level of enjoyment and excitement, their power reaches their full level. They are usually the cause of unusual thunderstorms.
name: Ampark

description: They unleash thunderbolts from their palms. They absorb electricity through their tail and use it to gain energy so it is able to move quickly.
name: Coyatt

description: They reside in a cyber world where no one is able to find it without the help of computer specialists. It was said to have been created to solve an unknown software problem; it seems to have failed...
name: Virubic

description: An upgraded version of Virubic thanks to an Ionatt's influence, it combats them in order to fix computer software. It has been very effective, though it is known to have a few errors.
name: Virubic2

description: Their vine whip techniques are unmatched, as their vine tails have minds of their own. Sometimes, the tail will whip around and trip up the Pokémon itself.
name: Starvine

description: They train themselves to command and use their vine tails professionally in order to strike. Its tails always eat the grass that surrounds it as it hunts for prey, making finding food difficult.
name: Midmow

description: They sit in dense grassy areas and wait for unsuspecting prey to come so it can attack with its tails. It blends in with its surroundings so well that it is called "The Walking Grassland".
name: Enbush

description: When they are first born, their bodies are a pale yellow. As they grow, their body temperatures continue to rise, giving them their red coloration. Their bodies are mostly comprised of steel.
name: Zinchar

description: Blazinc are often used in trash disposal, incinerating large quantities of trash with their flames. If their bodies cool down, they become extremely sluggish and sick.
name: Blazinc

description: Their body temperatures can reach 800,000 °F when they are furious. The metal outside of its body cannot be melted.
name: Titanius

description: Possessed by the spirits of engineers, these Pokémon build strange items and place them in palaces and museums. They cover their V-shaped eye hole and retract their arms and legs in order to make it appear as an artifact.
name: Awteau

description: Sometimes, the spirit inside escapes through its eye hole to personally attack those who have angered it to a certain extent. It can change its claws and use them as tools to help fix broken machinery and make them even better.
name: Damedge

description: Over time, its armor's legs fell off, allowing the ghostly spirit inside to partially escape. It shoots metal shrapnel from its body to pierce its enemies.
name: Stablunt

description: It is difficult to find, capture, train, and please this Pokémon. It is said to have taken a successful trainer 3 years to completely get their Daiuno to appreciate and like them.
name: Daiuno

description: No matter what you do for them, these Pokémon are always unsatisfied. Sometimes, they disappear and expect their trainers to come after them and tend to their wants.
name: Daudegoch

description: These Pokémon are very greedy when it comes to their power and will only use their full strength when they want. If their trainer does not pay attention to them or does what they want, they will not hesitate to attack them.
name: Triragoch

description: Born from an orange crystal that fell from space, it, along with Genzanas and Shoranas, are able to time travel. It keeps itself hidden as it spectates humans and Pokémon, viewing what happened in their pasts.
name: Kakonas

description: It is able to easily manipulate things in the present day when it feels that something negative is about to happen. Tugging on the cords on its chest heightens its Psychic power.
name: Genzanas

description: It is assumed that it was the one born as the leader over its siblings because of its old appearance. Able to see the futures of other people and Pokémon, it tries its best to ensure that negative things do not transpire due to the antics of its siblings.
name: Shoranas

description: She is known to have created the land of the Qiloh Region. She works alongside with Patanoros to keep Qiloh a prospering region.
name: Aedaragia

description: He is able to keep away all storm clouds, but also allows him when he is needed for vegetation. He has helped protecting Qiloh from hurricanes and tornadoes by devouring them.
name: Patanoros

description: One legend states that this savage legendary devoured livestock and left the bones arranged at the village's entrance, striking fear into the villagers.  This Pokémon is known for its menacing attitude towards The Time Keepers, as they constantly end up hindering its feasting session every time they travel through time.
name: Chupaca

description: The rings on its tail glow brightly as it brings newly found ideas and power to those who wish to have them. It has a very kind, but mischievous nature, taking and bringing cultures and ideas to different places in the world.
name: Rokinka
